9.24: Ninh ziouc gorngv mbuox zuangx mienh, “Cuotv mingh maah! Naaiv dauh sieqv maiv zeiz daic. Ninh m'njormh hnangv.” Zuangx mienh ziouc jatv ninh.
9.25: Zunc naaiv deix mienh cuotv mingh liuz, Yesu bieqc mingh nanv jienv wuov dauh sieqv nyei buoz. Sieqv ziouc jiez sin daaih aqv.
9.29: Yesu ziouc hluo ninh mbuo nyei m'zing yaac gorngv, “Ei meih mbuo sienx nyei, ziouc duqv aqv.”
9.11: Maaih deix Faa^li^si Mienh buatc ziouc naaic gaax sai-gorx, “Meih mbuo nyei sai-diex weic haaix diuc caux siou nzou nyei mienh caux mengh dauh waaic nyei mienh nyanc hnaangx?”
9.32: Wuov deix i dauh mienh cuotv mingh wuov zanc, mienh dorh dauh zuqc mienv muoqv hngongx, maiv haih gorngv waac nyei mienh, daaih lorz Yesu.
9.16: “Maiv maaih haaix dauh longc siang-ndie mbiev loz-lui. Siang-ndie haih soqv bun mbiev nyei dorngx jaa huv hlo.

26.21: Nyanc jienv hnaangx wuov zanc, Yesu gorngv, “Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, yiem meih mbuo mbu'ndongx maaih dauh oix maaic yie.”
26.15: naaic ninh mbuo, “Se gorngv yie zorqv Yesu jiu bun meih mbuo, meih mbuo bun haaix nyungc yie?” Sai mienh bieiv ziouc saauv faah ziepc norm loz-hnoi nyei zinh bun Yu^ndaatc.
26.23: Yesu dau, “Dongh caux yie juangc nzormc guoqv njuov wuov dauh oix maaic yie.
26.47: Yesu gorngv waac zungv maiv gaengh setv, ziepc nyeic dauh sai-gorx nyei yietc dauh, mbuox heuc Yu^ndaatc, daaih taux. Aengx maaih sai mienh bieiv caux baeqc fingx nyei mienh gox paaiv daaih nyei mienh camv dorh jienv nzuqc ndaauv, nanv jienv ndiangx-ndonx, gan jienv daaih.
26.56: Mv baac naaiv deix yietc zungv sic cuotv daaih weic bun doix nzengc zinh ndaangc douc waac mienh fiev jienv Ging-Sou wuov deix waac.” Wuov zanc sai-gorx mbuo ziouc guangc jienv Yesu, biaux nzengc mi'aqv.
26.20: Lungh maanz-hmuangx, Yesu caux ninh nyei ziepc nyeic dauh sai-gorx faaux dieh nyanc hnaangx.
26.18: Yesu mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo bieqc zingh mingh lorz yietc laanh mienh, yaac mbuox ninh, ‘Sai-Diex gorngv, yie nyei ziangh hoc taux aqv. Yie caux yie nyei sai-gorx oix yiem meih nyei biauv jiex Siex Maengc Zipv.’+”
26.33: Bide gorngv mbuox Yesu, “Maiv gunv ninh mbuo yietc zungv guangc Sai-Diex, yie yietc liuz maiv guangc.”
26.43: Yesu aengx nzuonx taux sai-gorx mbuo wuov, buatc ninh mbuo m'njormh mi'aqv, weic zuqc m'zing nyuix haic, nungx maiv nqoi.
26.48: Maaic Yesu wuov dauh jaa-ndaangc mbuox ziangx wuov deix, ninh oix zoux norm jangx-hoc bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv Yesu. Ninh gorngv, “Yie zom haaix dauh, se dongh meih mbuo oix zorqv wuov dauh aqv. Gunv zorqv aqv.”
26.22: Sai-gorx mbuo za'gengh! nzauh haic ziouc yietc dauh yietc dauh nyei naaic Yesu, “Ziouv aac, maiv zeiz yie saah?”
26.42: Yesu aengx mingh daux gaux da'nyeic nzunc. Ninh gorngv, “Yie nyei Die aah! Se gorngv naaiv norm zaanv yie simv maiv ndutv, za'gengh oix zuqc hopv nor, tov ei Die nyei eix zoux ziangx.”
26.50: Yesu gorngv, “Youz aac, meih oix zoux haaix nyungc gaanv zoux siepv aqv.” Wuov deix mienh ziouc daaih njiec buoz zorqv jienv Yesu.
26.31: Wuov zanc Yesu gorngv mbuox ninh nyei sai-gorx, “Ih muonz meih mbuo yietc zungv oix guangc jienv yie biaux, weic zuqc Ging-Sou fiev jienv gorngv, ‘Tin-Hungh oix daix ba'gi yungh nyei ziouv. Ba'gi yungh guanh ziouc nzaanx nzengc mi'aqv.’
26.4: caangh laangh daav za'eix bingx jienv zorqv Yesu daix guangc.
26.63: Mv baac Yesu maiv ko lo. Domh sai mienh aengx mbuox Yesu, “Yie ziangv jienv yietc liuz ziangh nyei Tin-Hungh hatc meih gorngv zaqc mbuox yie mbuo, meih za'gengh Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn, Giduc, zeiz fai maiv zeiz?”
26.29: Yie mbuox meih mbuo, yiem naaiv mingh, yie maiv caux meih mbuo hopv naaiv a'ngunc diuv. Zuov taux yiem yie nyei Die nyei guoqv cingx daaih duqv caux meih mbuo siang-hopv jiex.”
26.9: Naaiv deix youh ndaang haih maaic duqv nyaanh camv haic bun mienh jomc mienh niaa.”
26.75: Bide jangx zuqc Yesu gorngv nyei waac, “Jai zungv maiv gaengh nqaaix, meih maiv nyiemc yie buo nzunc.” Bide ziouc cuotv mingh nyiemv duqv kouv haic.
26.37: Ninh ziouc dorh Bide caux Se^mbe^ndi nyei i dauh dorn caux jienv mingh. Wuov zanc Yesu haiz hnyouv huaang, nzauh duqv kouv haic,
26.58: Bide gan jienv mingh mv baac leih go deix nyei, taux domh sai mienh nyei biauv-hlen bieqc laatc gu'nyuoz. Ninh caux zuov biauv nyei baeng zueiz jienv wuov, oix muangx gaax, naaiv deix sic hnangv haaix nor.
26.5: Mv baac ninh mbuo gorngv, “Naaiv deix jiex zipv nyei hnoi gu'nyuoz mbuo maiv dungx gaengh zorqv. Gamh nziex zuangx mienh haih lunc nzengc mv bei.”
26.62: Domh sai mienh ziouc souv jiez daaih naaic Yesu, “Naaiv deix mienh hnangv naaiv nor gox meih, meih maiv dau fai?”
26.71: Gorngv liuz, Bide ziouc mingh taux wuov laatc gaengh. Aengx maaih dauh m'sieqv bou buatc ninh ziouc mbuox yiem wuov ga'hlen nyei mienh, “Naaiv dauh mienh yaac gan Naa^saa^letv Mungv nyei Yesu aex.”
26.3: Wuov zanc sai mienh bieiv caux baeqc fingx nyei mienh gox gapv zunv yiem Kaa^yaa^faatv domh sai mienh nyei dinc,
26.64: Yesu dau, “Se hnangv meih gorngv nor.” Mv baac yie mbuox meih mbuo, nqa'haav hingv meih mbuo oix buatc yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, zueiz jienv Nernh Jiex nyei Tin-Hungh nyei mbiaauc maengx, yaac yiem wuov mbuonx njiec daaih.”
26.39: Yesu aengx jiex mingh deix ziouc mbaapv njiec, hmien taux ndau daux gaux gorngv, “Yie nyei Die aah! Se gorngv horpc nyei nor, tov Die zorqv nqoi yie oix zuqc hopv naaiv norm zaanv. Mv baac maiv dungx ei yie nyei eix. Oix zuqc ei Die nyei eix hnangv.”
26.69: Bide zueiz jienv biauv-hlen laatc gu'nyuoz wuov zanc, maaih dauh m'sieqv bou daaih gorngv, “Meih yaac gan wuov dauh Gaa^li^li Mienh, Yesu, maiv zeiz?”
26.6: Yesu yiem Mbe^taa^ni Laangz, butv jiex gomh huv baengc wuov dauh Simon nyei biauv.
26.8: Sai-gorx mbuo buatc hnangv naaic zoux, ninh mbuo qiex jiez haic ziouc gorngv, “Baeqc baeqc zaaux guangc zoux haaix nyungc?
26.57: Zorqv Yesu wuov deix mienh dorh ninh mingh taux Kaa^yaa^faatv domh sai mienh wuov. Maaih njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng caux mienh gox gapv zunv yiem wuov.
26.46: Jiez sin daaih, mbuo mingh aqv. Mangc gaax wuov! Maaic yie wuov dauh mienh daaih taux aqv.”
26.67: Ninh mbuo ziouc tuiv wuom-nzuih naetv Yesu nyei hmien yaac longc buoz-juonh mborqv. Maaih deix longc buoz-zaangv mbaix,
26.7: Nyanc jienv hnaangx nyei ziangh hoc, maaih dauh m'sieqv dorn dorh norm la'bieiv-baengh dapv buangv jaaix haic nyei youh ndaang daaih dox Yesu nyei m'nqorngv.
26.32: Mv baac yie daic mingh, Tin-Hungh aengx bun yie nangh daaih, yie ziouc mingh Gaa^li^li Saengv ndaangc meih mbuo.”
26.25: Maaic Yesu wuov dauh Yu^ndaatc gorngv, “Sai-Diex aah! Maiv zeiz yie saah?” Yesu dau, “Naaic se meih ganh gorngv aqv.”
26.17: Jiex dongh Maiv An Bingv nyei Njuov nyei Zipv daauh hnoi, sai-gorx mbuo daaih naaic Yesu, “Sai-Diex oix yie mbuo yiem haaix mbenc Siex Maengc Zipv nyei hnaangx bun Sai-Diex nyanc?”
26.61: gorngv, “Naaiv laanh mienh gorngv, ‘Yie haih caeqv nzengc zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv. Buo hnoi gu'nyuoz aengx ganh ceix jiez daaih.’+”
26.12: Ninh zorqv youh ndaang dox yie nyei sin, ninh zoux weic liuc leiz zangx yie nyei sei.
26.65: Domh sai mienh haiz naaiv deix waac, ziouc betv ninh ganh nyei lui yaac gorngv, “Ninh ki Tin-Hungh! Mbuo maiv zuqc lorz haaix dauh zoux zorng-zengx aqv. Meih mbuo ih zanc zungv haiz ninh ki Tin-Hungh.
26.34: Yesu gorngv mbuox Bide, “Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih. Ih muonz, jai zungv maiv gaengh nqaaix, meih zungv maiv nyiemc yie buo nzunc.”
26.30: Ninh mbuo baaux liuz nzung, ziouc cuotv daaih, mingh wuov Ga'lanv Mbong mi'aqv.
26.11: Meih mbuo zanc-zanc maaih mienh jomc mienh caux meih mbuo yiem. Mv baac meih mbuo maiv duqv yie caux meih mbuo yietc liuz yiem.
26.28: Naaiv se yie nyei nziaamv weic liepc jiez Tin-Hungh nyei ngaengc waac. Se liouc cuotv weic bun Tin-Hungh guangc mienh camv nyei zuiz.
26.44: Yesu aengx leih ninh mbuo, mingh daux gaux da'faam nzunc, yaac hnangv zinh ndaangc wuov nzunc nor daux gaux.
26.72: Bide aengx maiv nyiemc. Ninh gorngv, “Ndouv haaix nyungc yaac ndouv duqv, yie maiv hiuv wuov laanh mienh.”
26.68: yaac gorngv, “Meih naaic dauh Giduc aah! Cai gaax! Mbuox yie mbuo maah! Haaix dauh mborqv meih?”
26.45: Nqa'haav ninh aengx nzuonx sai-gorx mbuo wuov. Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo corc yiem naaic bueix m'njormh hitv kuonx? Mangc maah! Ziangh hoc taux aqv. Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, zuqc jiu bun yiem zuiz-mienh nyei buoz-ndiev.
26.19: Sai-gorx mbuo ziouc ei Yesu nyei waac zoux, mingh mbenc Siex Maengc Zipv nyei hnaangx.
26.54: Mv baac, se gorngv yie hnangv naaic zoux, sic hnangv haaix nor haih cuotv daaih doix Ging-Sou fiev horpc zuqc cuotv nyei waac?”
26.35: Bide gorngv, “Maiv gunv yie zuqc caux Sai-Diex daic, yie yietc liuz nyiemc, maiv guangc meih.” Wuov deix sai-gorx yietc zungv yaac fih hnangv nyei gorngv.
26.41: Oix zuqc ging jienv hnyouv daux gaux, tov Tin-Hungh maiv dungx bun meih mbuo buangh zuqc seix hnyouv nyei sic. Meih mbuo nyei hnyouv oix zoux horpc, mv baac sin zaangc mau haic.”
26.13: Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, maiv gunv mingh taux lungh ndiev haaix norm dorngx zunh naaiv kuv fienx, mienh ziouc gorngv naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn zoux nyei jauv-louc weic jangx taux ninh.”
26.60: Mv baac maiv gunv maaih mienh camv daaih zoux jaav zorng-zengx, yaac lorz maiv duqv haaix nyungc gorn-baengx gox ninh. Zoux gau, maaih i dauh cuotv daaih
26.59: Sai mienh bieiv caux Gunv Sic Wuic nyei zuangx mienh lorz jaav zorng-zengx gox Yesu weic bun ninh zuqc daix.
26.70: Mv baac Bide dorng jienv zuangx mienh maiv nyiemc. Ninh gorngv, “Yie maiv hiuv duqv meih gorngv haaix nyungc.”
26.40: Yesu aengx nzuonx taux wuov deix buo dauh sai-gorx wuov, buatc ninh mbuo m'njormh nzengc. Ninh ziouc mbuox Bide, “Meih mbuo zoux haaix nyungc caux yie zuov maiv duqv yietc norm ziangh hoc?
26.55: Yesu ziouc gorngv mbuox gapv zunv nyei zuangx mienh, “Meih mbuo buatc yie hnangv zaqc baeng cingx daaih dorh jienv nzuqc ndaauv caux ndiangx-ndonx daaih zorqv yie? Yie hnoi-hnoi zueiz jienv zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv njaaux mienh, meih mbuo yaac maiv zorqv.
26.26: Nyanc jienv wuov zanc, Yesu zorqv njuov daaih, laengz zingh liuz Tin-Hungh, ziouc maeqv nqoi bun ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo, yaac gorngv, “Zipv daaih nyanc aqv. Naaiv se yie nyei sin.”
26.52: Yesu mbuox ninh mbuo, “Zorqv meih nyei nzuqc ndaauv tapv jienv paiv maah! Haaix dauh longc nzuqc ndaauv, zungv oix zuqc laaix nzuqc ndaauv daic.
26.14: Wuov deix ziepc nyeic dauh sai-gorx maaih dauh, dongh mbuox heuc Yu^ndaatc I^saa^kaa^li^otc wuov dauh, mingh lorz sai mienh bieiv
26.27: Yesu aengx zorqv zaanv a'ngunc diuv daaih, laengz zingh liuz Tin-Hungh, ziouc bun ninh mbuo, yaac gorngv, “Meih mbuo yietc zungv gunv hopv maah!
26.38: Yesu mbuox ninh mbuo, “Yie haiz za'gengh! nzauh haic, hnangv haih daic nyei nor. Meih mbuo caux yie yiem naaiv ging hnyouv zuov jienv oc.”
26.74: Bide ziouc aengx ndouv jiez zioux gorngv, “Yie za'gengh! maiv hiuv duqv wuov laanh mienh.” Liemh zeih jai nqaaix aqv.
26.49: Yu^ndaatc baeng zaqc nyei mingh taux Yesu wuov yaac gorngv, “Sai-Diex aah! Baengh orn nyei saah?” Ziouc zom ninh nyei hmien.
26.66: Meih mbuo hnangv haaix nor hnamv?” Ninh mbuo dau, “Ninh dorngc aqv. Zic duqv daic aqv.”
26.36: Yesu caux ninh nyei sai-gorx mingh norm dorngx, mbuox heuc Getc^se^maa^ni. Yesu mbuox ninh nyei sai-gorx, “Meih mbuo zueiz jienv naaiv zuov yie mingh wuov maengx daux gaux.”
26.53: Meih maiv hiuv fai? Yie haih tov yie nyei Die, nduqc dangh hnangv ninh ziouc paaiv fin-mienh baeng gauh camv ziepc nyeic guanh daaih tengx yie.
26.10: Yesu hiuv duqv ninh mbuo hnangv haaix nor gorngv ninh ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo zoux haaix nyungc la'nyauv naaiv dauh m'sieqv dorn? Ninh hnangv naaiv nor zoux bun yie se longx haic aqv.
26.2: “Meih mbuo hiuv duqv maaih i hnoi hnangv taux Siex Maengc Zipv aqv. Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, ziouc zuqc zorqv jiu bun mienh ding ziepc nzaangc jaax.”
26.1: Yesu gorngv liuz naaiv deix yietc zungv waac, ninh mbuox ninh nyei sai-gorx,
26.73: Yietc zanc jiex, souv jienv wuov ga'hlen nyei mienh daaih gorngv Bide, “Zeiz nyei. Meih gengh yietc dauh wuov deix mienh aqv. Meih gorngv waac nyei qiex bun meih ganh bingx maiv mbueiz aqv.”
26.24: Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, oix zuqc guei seix hnangv Ging-Sou gorngv nor. Mv baac maaic yie wuov dauh zungv zuqc kouv aqv. Ninh maiv dungx cuotv seix gauh longx.”
26.16: Yiem naaic daaih, Yu^ndaatc lorz qangx zorqv Yesu jiu bun ninh mbuo.
26.51: Maaih dauh caux Yesu yiem wuov nyei mienh baeng ninh nyei nzuqc ndaauv cuotv, hngaqv domh sai mienh nyei nouh, pai zuqc nouh nyei yietc bung m'normh ndutv mingh.

5.21: “Loz-hnoi njaaux mienh naaiv deix waac meih mbuo haiz jiex nyei, ‘Maiv dungx daix mienh. Haaix dauh daix mienh oix zuqc dingc zuiz.’
5.15: Yaac maiv maaih mienh diemv zieqc dang daaih, zorqv tongv nqopv jienv. Dang m'daaih don dang nyei baaih ziux njang yietc biauv mienh.
5.23: “Hnangv naaiv nor, se gorngv meih dorh ga'naaiv mingh ziec-dorngh oix ziec bun Tin-Hungh, mv baac taux wuov jangx zuqc meih nyei gorx-youz maaih haaix nyungc caux meih maiv horpc,
5.47: Se gorngv meih mbuo kungx caux meih mbuo hnamv wuov deix mienh gorngv waac hnangv, meih mbuo zoux haaix nyungc gauh longx zuangx mienh? Liemh maiv gaengh hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh wuov deix mienh yaac hnangv naaic nor zoux ni!
5.20: Yie ziouc mbuox meih mbuo, meih mbuo oix zuqc gan Tin-Hungh gauh longx njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng caux Faa^li^si Mienh. Maiv zei aeqv, meih mbuo zungv maiv duqv bieqc Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv.
5.18: “Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, maaih lungh caux ndau corc yiem jienv nyei ziangh hoc, Leiz-Latc nyei yietc dimv yietc waeqc nzaangc zungv maiv haih ndortv. Zuov taux nyungc-nyungc dunh yunh nzengc.
5.33: “Loz-hnoi njaaux mienh naaiv deix waac meih mbuo yaac haiz mi'aqv. Waac gorngv, ‘Maiv dungx bungx ndortv meih laengz nyei waac. Meih yiem Ziouv nyei nza'hmien laengz haaix nyungc waac oix zuqc ei jienv zoux.’
5.43: “Meih mbuo haiz jiex loz-hnoi mienh njaaux naaiv deix waac, ‘Oix zuqc hnamv meih nyei gorx-youz, nzorng meih nyei win-wangv.’
5.48: “Meih mbuo oix zuqc dunh yunh, hnangv meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex nor, dunh yunh.
5.22: Mv baac yie mbuox meih mbuo, haaix dauh qiex jiez ninh nyei gorx-youz, zungv zuqc siemv zuiz aqv. Haaix dauh hemx ninh nyei gorx-youz, ‘Ga'naaiv-hngongx aah!’ wuov dauh zuqc dorh mingh Gunv Sic Wuic siemv zuiz. Haaix dauh hemx ninh nyei gorx-youz, ‘Ga'naaiv-mbuo piqv,’ gamh nziex wuov dauh zic duqv ndortv deic nyuoqc nyei douz.
5.42: “Maaih mienh tengx meih tov haaix nyungc, meih oix zuqc bun aqv. Maaih mienh oix gaav meih nyei ga'naaiv longc, yaac oix zuqc bun ninh longc.
5.31: “Aengx maaih joux waac gorngv, ‘Haaix dauh leih ninh nyei auv oix zuqc fiev zeiv leih cai sou bun jienv ninh.’
5.4: Maaih you-nzauh wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix tengx jaiv you-nzauh.
5.29: Hnangv naaic, se gorngv meih nyei mbiaauc bung m'zing nduov meih baamz zuiz, oix zuqc gueix guangc. Meih nyei sin waaic fangx corc gauh longx meih nyei ziangh sin zuqc ndortv deic nyuoqc.
5.9: Kuinx i bung mienh horpc hnyouv daaih maaih baengh orn wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix nyiemc ninh mbuo zoux ninh nyei naamh nyouz.
5.37: Meih kungx oix zuqc gorngv zaqc zeiz fai maiv zeiz gaux aqv. Aengx gorngv gauh camv naaic se yiem hiuang orqv wuov dauh daaih.
5.5: Hnyouv suonc wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh laengz bun nyei, ninh mbuo oix duqv zipv nzengc.
5.3: “Ganh hiuv duqv ganh qiemx zuqc Tin-Hungh wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc maaih Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv ninh mbuo.
5.39: Mv baac ih zanc yie gorngv mbuox meih mbuo, mienh zoux dorngc bun meih, maiv dungx jaauv win. Se gorngv maaih mienh mbaix meih nyei mbiaauc bung hmien, oix zuqc liemh zaaix maengx bung huin mingh bun ninh mbaix.
5.6: Ngorc oix zoux horpc Tin-Hungh nyei hnyouv wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix bun ninh mbuo duqv buangv eix.
5.8: Maaih cing-nzengc nyei hnyouv wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc ninh mbuo oix duqv buatc Tin-Hungh.
5.46: “Se gorngv meih mbuo kungx hnamv dongh hnamv meih mbuo wuov deix mienh hnangv, Tin-Hungh weic haaix diuc horpc zuqc bun zingh nyeic meih mbuo? Liemh tengx Lomaa hungh jaa siou nzou-zinh wuov deix mienh yaac hnangv naaiv nor zoux.
5.7: Korv-lienh mienh wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh oix korv-lienh ninh mbuo.
5.32: Mv baac ih zanc yie mbuox meih mbuo, haaix dauh leih ninh nyei auv yaac maiv zeiz laaix ninh nyei auv hienx nqox, wuov dauh auv aengx mingh longc siang-nqox, wuov dauh loz-nqox zoux bun ninh nyei auv benx hienx nqox nyei mienh. Ninh longc wuov dauh siang-nqox yaac benx hienx auv nyei mienh aqv.
5.25: “Gorngv hnangv maaih mienh gox meih, dorh meih mingh wuov sic dorngh, meih caux ninh mingh maiv gaengh taux sic dorngh, oix zuqc caux ninh gorngv horpc. Zuov taux sic dorngh, nziex ninh oix zorqv meih jiu bun siemv zuiz jien. Siemv zuiz jien aengx zorqv meih jiu bun hungh baeng. Meih ziouc zuqc wuonx jienv loh aqv.
5.17: “Maiv dungx hnamv yie daaih guangc Mose nyei Leiz-Latc caux Tin-Hungh nyei Douc Waac Mienh njaaux nyei waac. Yie maiv zeiz daaih guangc. Yie daaih weic bun yietc zungv cuotv daaih zien.
5.12: Oix zuqc njien-youh a'hneiv weic zuqc yiem wuov tin-dorngh maaih domh zingh nyeic oix bun meih mbuo. Zinh ndaangc douc waac mienh fih hnangv nyei zuqc mienh zoux doqc.
5.34: Mv baac ih zanc yie mbuox meih mbuo, maiv dungx ziangv haaix nyungc laengz waac. Maiv dungx ziangv tin-dorngh laengz waac, weic zuqc tin-dorngh se Tin-Hungh nyei weic.
5.30: Gorngv hnangv meih nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz bun meih baamz zuiz, oix zuqc hngaqv guangc. Zoqc jieqv buoz corc gauh longx meih nyei ziangh sin zuqc ndortv deic nyuoqc.
5.11: “Meih mbuo weic yie zuqc mienh gorngv doqc, zoux doqc, zuqc mienh gorngv nyungc-nyungc waaic nyei jauv, meih mbuo ziouc maaih njien-youh aqv.
5.28: Mv baac ih zanc yie mbuox meih mbuo, haaix dauh buatc dauh m'sieqv dorn yaac haiz hanc, se dorngx yiem hnyouv hienx liuz aqv.
5.44: Mv baac ih zanc yie gorngv mbuox meih mbuo, oix zuqc hnamv meih mbuo nyei win-wangv. Zoux doqc meih mbuo wuov deix, oix zuqc tengx ninh mbuo daux gaux.
5.45: Meih mbuo hnangv naaiv nor zoux, meih mbuo ziouc benx meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex nyei dorn aqv. “Maiv gunv kuv mienh fai mienh waaic mienh, Tin-Hungh yaac bun mba'hnoi ziux fih hnangv nyei. Ninh yaac bun lungh duih mbiungc tengx zoux longx zoux waaic nyei mienh duqv fih hnangv.
5.19: “Hnangv naaic, haaix dauh baamz liemh faix jiex wuov diuh leiz, aengx njaaux mienh fih hnangv nyei baamz, wuov dauh yiem Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv zuqc zoux gauh faix jiex. Mv baac haaix dauh muangx nzengc leiz, aengx njaaux mienh fih hnangv nyei zoux, wuov dauh yiem Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv duqv zoux hlo.
5.35: Yaac maiv dungx ziangv ndau, weic zuqc ndau se ninh lorngx zaux nyei dorngx. Yaac maiv dungx ziangv Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh laengz waac, weic zuqc naaiv norm zingh se Domh Hungh Diex nyei zingh.
5.41: “Se gorngv maaih dauh mienh zorqv meih fungx bou, aapv meih nyiex ninh nyei ga'naaiv yietc gilo jauv, meih oix zuqc tengx nyiex mingh i gilo.
5.13: “Meih mbuo se hnangv nzauv weic yiem baamh mienh mbu'ndongx. Mv baac se gorngv nzauv nyei mueix tuix zaamv mingh, hnangv haaix nor noic duqv aengx nzaaih daaih? Naaiv deix nzauv maiv lamh longc aqv. Oix zuqc dox guangc bun mienh caaiv hnangv.
5.40: “Se gorngv maaih dauh mienh dorh meih mingh sic dorngh oix gox longc meih nyei lui, liemh meih nyei domh lui yaac oix zuqc bun ninh.
5.26: Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih, meih oix zuqc wuonx jienv loh zuov taux meih jaauv sung nzengc, maiv caa yietc norm dongh zinh nyei zaeqv cingx duqv cuotv.
5.14: “Meih mbuo se hnangv njang weic ziux lungh ndiev mienh. Yietc norm zingh yiem wuov mbong-ningv maiv haih bingx maiv mbueiz mienh.
5.27: “Meih mbuo haiz jiex loz-hnoi njaaux mienh naaiv deix waac, ‘Maiv dungx hienx auv hienx nqox.’
5.38: “Meih mbuo haiz jiex loz-hnoi njaaux mienh naaiv joux waac, ‘M'zing jaauv m'zing, nyaah jaauv nyaah.’
5.36: Liemh maiv dungx ziangv meih nyei m'nqorngv laengz waac weic zuqc meih maiv haih zoux yietc diuh meih nyei mba'biei baeqc fai jieqv.
5.10: Weic zoux ei Tin-Hungh nyei eix zuqc mienh zoux doqc wuov deix, maaih njien-youh aqv, weic zuqc maaih Tin-Hungh zoux ninh mbuo nyei Ziouv gunv ninh mbuo.
5.2: Yesu ziouc jiez gorn njaaux ninh mbuo. Ninh gorngv,
5.1: Yesu buatc mienh ndongc naaic camv, ninh ziouc faaux norm mbong mingh zueiz jienv. Ninh nyei sai-gorx mbuo yaac daaih yiem zunv.
5.24: oix zuqc zorqv meih dorh mingh nyei ga'naaiv an jienv ziec-dorngh ga'hlen, mingh caux meih nyei gorx-youz gorngv horpc. Gorngv sung liuz cingx daaih zorqv meih nyei ga'naaiv ziec bun Tin-Hungh.
5.16: Meih mbuo yaac oix zuqc hnangv dang nor, ziux lungh ndiev mienh. Hnangv naaic, ninh mbuo duqv buatc meih mbuo zoux nyei kuv sic ziouc taaih meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex.

27.21: Bilaatv ziouc naaic zuangx mienh, “Naaiv deix i dauh, meih mbuo oix yie bungx haaix dauh?” Ninh mbuo dau, “Bungx Mbaa^lapv^mbatc.”
27.15: Hnyangx-hnyangx taux Siex Maengc Zipv, Lomaa Zungx maaih leiz bungx dauh wuonx loh nyei mienh ziux zuangx mienh tov bungx haaix dauh.
27.23: Bilaatv aengx naaic ninh mbuo, “Wuov nyungc, ninh zoux dorngc haaix nyungc zuiz?” Zuangx mienh jaa heuc gauh mbui, “Zorqv ninh ding jienv ziepc nzaangc jaax maah!”
27.47: Maaih deix souv jienv wuov nyei mienh haiz ninh gorngv naaiv deix waac ziouc gorngv, “Ov, ninh heuc E^li^yaa.”
27.56: Wuov deix m'sieqv dorn maaih dauh Makv^ndaa^laa Mungv nyei Maa^li^yaa, maaih Yaagorpc caux Yosepv nyei maa Maa^li^yaa, yaac maaih Se^mbe^ndi nyei i dauh dorn nyei maa.
27.20: Sai mienh bieiv caux mienh gox nduov zuangx mienh tov Bilaatv bungx Mbaa^lapv^mbatc, daix Yesu guangc.
27.18: Bilaatv hiuv duqv zoux hlo wuov deix Yiutai Mienh mueic jieqv Yesu cingx daaih zorqv Yesu jiu bun ninh.
27.33: Ninh mbuo mingh taux norm dorngx, mbuox heuc Gon^go^taa, eix leiz se M'nqorngv-Korqv Dorngx.
27.43: Ninh kaux Tin-Hungh yaac gorngv ninh zoux Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn. Wuov nyungc, mbuo mangc gaax Tin-Hungh ih zanc za'gengh oix njoux ninh fai maiv njoux.”
27.48: Maaih dauh yiem wuov nyei mienh liemh zeih tiux mingh zorqv lai-nzeix-sortv ziemx a'ngunc diuv-sui daaih, longc luoqc diqc guaengv baqv jienv cunv bun Yesu hopv.
27.22: Bilaatv ziouc naaic, “Wuov nyungc, Yesu, dongh mienh heuc Giduc wuov dauh, meih mbuo oix yie hnangv haaix nor zoux?” Ninh mbuo yietc zungv dau, “Zorqv ninh ding jienv ziepc nzaangc jaax!”
27.42: Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ninh njoux duqv mienh mv baac maiv haih njoux ninh ganh orqc! Ninh zoux I^saa^laa^en Mienh nyei Hungh! Se gorngv ninh ih zanc yiem ziepc nzaangc jaax njiec daaih, yie mbuo ziouc sienx ninh aqv.
27.50: Yesu aengx heuc nzunc mbui nyei liuz, ziouc dangx qiex mi'aqv.
27.31: Guatc doqc jatv liuz, ninh mbuo ziouc jaiv nqoi lui-ndaauv-siqv, aengx zorqv ninh ganh nyei lui tengx ninh zuqv jienv ziouc dorh ninh mingh ding ziepc nzaangc jaax.
27.4: Ninh gorngv, “Yie zoux dorngc zuiz aqv, weic zuqc yie maaic maiv maaih zuiz nyei mienh bun ninh zuqc daic.” Wuov deix mienh dau, “Naaic maaih haaix nyungc paanx taux yie mbuo? Naaiv meih ganh nyei sic aqv.”
27.63: yaac gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, yie mbuo jangx zuqc zinh ndaangc nduov mienh wuov dauh lov maiv gaengh daic wuov zanc ninh gorngv, ‘Nqa'haav buo hnoi yie aengx nangh daaih.’
27.29: yaac longc njimv ciqv norm hungh ningv ndongx jienv ninh nyei m'nqorngv. Ninh mbuo aengx zorqv luoqc diqc guaengv bun ninh nyei mbiaauc jieqv buoz nanv jienv, aengx gueic njiec ninh nyei nza'hmien guatc doqc jatv ninh, yaac gorngv, “Yiutai Mienh nyei hungh aah! Ziangh duqv maanc fuix aqv!”
27.9: Naaiv deix sic cuotv daaih doix-diuc douc waac mienh, Ye^le^mi, gorngv nyei waac. Ye^le^mi gorngv, “Ninh mbuo zorqv faah ziepc norm zinh, dongh I^saa^laa^en Mienh weic ninh dingc nyei jaax-zinh,
27.37: Yiem Yesu nyei m'nqorngv gu'nguaaic ninh mbuo fiev jienv gox ninh wuov deix waac. Waac gorngv, “Naaiv se Yiutai Mienh nyei Hungh, Yesu.”
27.58: Yosepv mingh lorz Bilaatv, tov Yesu nyei sei. Bilaatv ziouc nqoi nzuih jiu Yesu nyei sei bun Yosepv.
27.5: Yu^ndaatc ziouc zoi wuov deix nyaanh guangc wuov zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv gu'nyuoz cuotv mingh, ziouc mingh ndiux jaang daic mi'aqv.
27.62: Da'nyeic hnoi, se taux Dingh Gong Hnoi, sai mienh bieiv caux Faa^li^si Mienh mingh lorz Bilaatv,
27.3: Maaic Yesu wuov dauh Yu^ndaatc buatc Yesu zuqc dingc zuiz wuov zanc, ninh hnyouv mun haic aengx dorh wuov deix faah ziepc norm zinh daaih tuix bun sai mienh bieiv caux mienh gox.
27.64: Hnangv naaic, tov Domh Gorx njiec lingc paaiv baeng mingh longx-longx zuov jienv zouv taux da'faam hnoi. Nziex ninh nyei sai-gorx haih mingh nimc sei. Nqa'haav haih mbuox zuangx mienh, ‘Ninh daic mingh aengx nangh daaih aqv.’ Se gorngv hnangv naaic, gorngv-baeqc naaiv nzunc gauh waaic zinh ndaangc wuov nzunc aqv.”
27.39: Jiex jauv nyei mienh ki ninh, huangx jienv m'nqorngv gorngv,
27.6: Sai mienh bieiv nzauz naaiv deix nyaanh daaih gorngv, “Naaiv deix nyaanh se maaiz maengc nyaanh ziouc hnangv guoqv jienv nziaamv nor. Caux jienv zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv wuov deix nyaanh dapv se dorngc leiz.”
27.8: Weic naaiv wuov nzong ndau maaih mbuox heuc “Maaih Nziaamv nyei Ndau” daaih taux ih jaax hnoi.
27.57: Lungh maanz-hmuangx aqv, maaih dauh yiem Aa^li^maa^tie Mungv nyei butv-zoih mienh, mbuox heuc Yosepv, daaih taux. Ninh yaac zoux Yesu nyei sai-gorx.
27.46: Leih maiv go njiec aanx buo norm ziangh hoc, Yesu heuc qiex hlo nyei gorngv, “Eli, Eli, laa^maa^saa^mbakc^taa^ni!” Eix leiz se, “Yie nyei Tin-Hungh aah! Yie nyei Tin-Hungh! Meih weic haaix diuc guangc yie?”
27.7: Ninh mbuo ziouc caangh laangh daaih longc naaiv deix nyaanh maaiz nzong wuov dauh nanv nie zaangc nyei ndau, zoux ganh fingx mienh nyei zouv-gemh.
27.32: Ninh mbuo cuotv mingh wuov zanc, buangh zuqc dauh Sailin mienh, mbuox heuc Simon. Baeng ziouc aapv Simon ndaam Yesu nyei ziepc nzaangc jaax.
27.25: Zuangx mienh dongh joux waac dau, “Naaiv dauh mienh daic, liouc cuotv ninh nyei nziaamv, youh yie mbuo caux yie mbuo ganh nyei fun-faqv ndaam-dorng.”
27.17: Zuangx mienh gapv zunv wuov zanc, Bilaatv naaic gaax ninh mbuo, “Meih mbuo oix yie bungx haaix dauh? Bungx Mbaa^lapv^mbatc fai bungx Yesu, dongh mienh heuc Giduc wuov dauh?”
27.61: Makv^ndaa^laa Mungv nyei Maa^li^yaa aengx caux ganh dauh Maa^li^yaa zueiz wuov, hmien huin mingh zouv wuov bung.
27.12: Mv baac mienh gox caux sai mienh bieiv gox ninh wuov zanc, ninh maiv dau haaix nyungc.
27.65: Bilaatv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Wuov nyungc, gunv dorh baeng mingh ei meih mbuo haih zoux nyei longx-longx nyei zuov jienv zouv maah!”
27.34: Taux wuov ninh mbuo zorqv a'ngunc diuv peux jienv im nyei ga'naaiv bun Yesu hopv. Mv baac Yesu seix liuz, ziouc maiv hopv.
27.30: Ninh mbuo aengx tuiv wuom-nzuih naetv ninh, zorqv wuov diuh luoqc diqc guaengv mborqv ninh nyei m'nqorngv.
27.11: Wuov zanc, Yesu yiem Bilaatv Zungx nyei nza'hmien. Bilaatv naaic ninh, “Meih zoux Yiutai Mienh nyei hungh?” Yesu dau, “Zeiz nyei. Se hnangv meih gorngv nor.”
27.28: Ninh mbuo jaiv nqoi Yesu nyei lui-houx aengx zorqv deix lui-ndaauv-siqv tengx ninh buix jienv,
27.44: Liemh ding ninh nyei ga'hlen wuov deix zaqc baeng fih hnangv nyei gorngv ki ninh.
27.45: Lungh ziangx aanx nyei ziangh hoc, wuov norm deic-bung hmuangx nzengc taux njiec aanx buo norm ziangh hoc.
27.19: Bilaatv zueiz jienv siemv zuiz weic wuov zanc, ninh nyei auv bun waac mingh mbuox ninh, “Maiv dungx zoux haaix nyungc bun wuov laanh kuv mienh weic zuqc a'hmuangx yie mbeix mbeix taux naaiv laanh mienh ziouc haiz hnyouv maiv longx yietc deix.”
27.54: Zuov Yesu wuov dauh baeng-bieiv caux ninh nyei baeng buatc ndau dongz yaac buatc nyungc-nyungc sic cuotv, haeqv ninh mbuo gamh nziex haic. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Naaiv dauh za'gengh Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn aqv.”
27.35: Ninh mbuo zorqv Yesu ding jienv ziepc nzaangc jaax, aengx zorqv ninh nyei lui-houx daaih ndouv mangc weic bun nqoi.
27.41: Sai mienh bieiv caux njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng caux mienh gox fih hnangv nyei jatv ninh.
27.13: Bilaatv ziouc naaic ninh, “Ninh mbuo gox meih naaiv deix yietc zungv sic meih maiv haiz fai?”
27.60: dorh mingh zangx siang-la'bieiv-zouv. Naaiv norm zouv Yosepv coqv hoqc zuqc daaih liouh ninh ganh longc. Zangx liuz, ninh tui kuaaiv domh la'bieiv mbaeqc jienv zouv-gaengh, ziouc mingh mi'aqv.
27.59: Yosepv ziouc longc siang-la'maah ndie beu jienv Yesu nyei sei,
27.40: “Aav, meih oix caeqv zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv, nqa'haav buo hnoi aengx ganh ceix jiez daaih ni! Njoux meih ganh aqv. Se gorngv meih zoux Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn, njiec ziepc nzaangc jaax daaih maah!”
27.55: Yiem Gaa^li^li gan jienv Yesu daaih fu-sux ninh wuov deix m'sieqv dorn camv nyei yaac yiem wuov go deix nyei mangc.
27.26: Bilaatv ziouc bungx Mbaa^lapv^mbatc bun ninh mbuo. Mv baac Yesu, ninh bun zuqc biaav-bin mborqv liuz, jiu bun baeng dorh mingh ding ziepc nzaangc jaax.
27.52: Janx-daic zouv yaac nqoi mi'aqv. Tin-Hungh nyei cing-nzengc baeqc fingx, dongh daic mingh wuov deix, maaih camv nyei nangh daaih
27.14: Mv baac Yesu yietc joux waac maiv dau ninh. Bilaatv za'gengh mbuoqc horngh haic.
27.27: Bilaatv Zungx nyei baeng aengx dorh Yesu bieqc zungx nyei dinc gu'nyuoz. Wuov guanh baeng yietc zungv ziouc mingh weih jienv ninh.
27.38: Ninh mbuo aengx ding i dauh zaqc baeng yiem Yesu nyei ga'hlen. Maaih dauh yiem mbiaauc maengx. Maaih dauh yiem zaaix maengx.
27.49: Mv baac maaih deix yiem wuov nyei mienh gorngv, “Mbuo zuov mangc gaax, E^li^yaa gengh daaih njoux ninh nyei fai?”
27.66: Ninh mbuo ziouc mingh nqaapv jienv yienx zouv-gaengh, yaac bun baeng longx-longx nyei zuov jienv.
27.36: Nqa'haav ninh mbuo zueiz jienv wuov zuov mangc jienv ninh.
27.53: cuotv zouv mingh. Yesu nangh daaih wuov zanc, wuov deix mienh bieqc wuov norm cing-nzengc nyei zingh, Ye^lu^saa^lem. Maaih mienh camv nyei duqv buatc ninh mbuo.
27.10: longc maaiz nanv nie zaangc nyei ndau, hnangv Ziouv mbuox yie zoux nor.”
27.2: Ninh mbuo ziouc ndoh Yesu, ken mingh jiu bun Lomaa Zungx, Bilaatv.
27.1: Lungh ndorm nziouv, zuangx sai mienh bieiv caux Yiutai Mienh nyei mienh gox gapv zunv caangh laangh ziangx hnangv haaix nor haih daix Yesu.
27.24: Bilaatv buatc ninh gorngv jienv mingh yaac maiv lamh longc, zungv gamh nziex zuangx mienh oix lunc nzengc. Ninh ziouc zorqv wuom dorng jienv zuangx mienh nzaaux buoz yaac gorngv, “Naaiv dauh mienh zuqc daic se maiv paanx taux yie. Naaiv yietc zungv ndortv zuqc meih mbuo ganh aqv.”
27.16: Wuov zanc maaih dauh zuqc wuonx jienv loh nyei zuiz-mienh mbuox heuc Mbaa^lapv^mbatc. Haaix dauh yaac hiuv duqv ninh nyei.
27.51: Yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv gu'nyuoz wuov kuaaiv mbaeqc gaengh ndie yiem gu'nguaaic mbaaix dorng ga'ndiev, zoux i maengx mi'aqv. Ndau yaac dongz, la'bieiv yaac mbaaix nzengc.

14.21: Nyanc nyei mienh, daan m'jangc dorn hnangv, maaih leih maiv go biaa cin dauh. M'sieqv dorn caux fu'jueiv maiv funx.
14.15: Lungh maanz-hmuangx, sai-gorx mbuo daaih mbuox Yesu, “Lungh aav lamh hmuangx aqv. Naaiv yaac lengh nyei dorngx. Tov mbuox zuangx mienh mingh aqv. Ninh mbuo ziouc haih mingh maaih laangz nyei dorngx maaiz nyanc.”
14.12: Yo^han nyei sai-gorx mbuo mingh zorqv sei dorh mingh zangx. Zangx liuz, ninh mbuo ziouc mingh mbuox Yesu mi'aqv.
14.17: Sai-gorx mbuo gorngv, “Yiem naaiv yie mbuo kungx maaih biaa norm njuov caux i dauh mbiauz hnangv.”
14.30: Mv baac Bide buatc nziaaux hlo, haeqv ninh gamh nziex haic ziouc zemh jienv njiec. Ninh heuc, “Ziouv aah! Ziouv! Njoux yie maah!”
14.20: Zuangx mienh nyanc beuv nzengc. Zengc njiec wuov deix, sai-gorx mbuo siou daaih duqv ziepc nyeic ndaan buangv.
14.4: weic zuqc Yo^han zanc-zanc gorngv mbuox Helotv, “Meih maiv maaih leiz longc He^lo^ndietc zoux auv.”
14.28: Bide ziouc gorngv, “Ziouv aah! Se gorngv zeiz meih nor, heuc yie yangh wuom-minc mingh meih naaic.”
14.33: Yiem nzangv wuov deix ziouc baaix Yesu. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv aah! Meih za'gengh Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn aqv.”
14.35: Yiem wuov norm dorngx mienh zieqv duqv Yesu ziouc bun waac mingh gormx wuov norm horngc zaangc. Mienh ziouc dorh yietc zungv baengc mienh taux Yesu wuov
14.19: Yesu heuc zuangx mienh zueiz jienv maaih miev nyei dorngx. Ninh aengx zorqv wuov deix biaa norm njuov caux i dauh mbiauz daaih, cau hmien mangc lungh, laengz zingh Tin-Hungh liuz ziouc maeqv nqoi bun sai-gorx. Sai-gorx mbuo dorh mingh bun zuangx mienh nyanc.
14.34: Ninh mbuo jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc koiv-dorn ziouc taux Gen^ne^saa^letv Deic.
14.22: Yesu ziouc beqv sai-gorx mbuo bieqc nzangv mingh ndaangc, jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc koiv-dorn. Ninh ganh yiem wuov heuc mienh bun nzaanx nzuonx nzengc.
14.23: Zuangx mienh nzaanx nzengc, Yesu ganh faaux mbong-aiv mingh daux gaux. Lungh maanz-hmuangx aqv, Yesu ganh corc yiem wuov nyei.
14.13: Yesu haiz liuz naaiv deix sic, ninh ganh ziouc bieqc nzangv cuotv wuov aengx mingh lengh nyei dorngx. Zuangx mienh hiuv duqv ziouc cuotv ninh mbuo nyei mungv yangh jauv gan jienv Yesu mingh.
14.9: Helotv Hungh nzauh haic mv baac laaix ninh dorng jienv kaeqv mienh laengz liuz ngaengc waac ninh ziouc njiec lingc ei wuov dauh sieqv nyei waac zoux.
14.26: Sai-gorx mbuo buatc ninh yangh wuom-minc daaih, ninh mbuo ziouc gamh nziex! haic. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Aav, naaiv janx-daic njoiz saah!” ziouc haeqv ninh mbuo waiz-waiz nyei heuc.
14.5: Helotv ziouc jiez hnyouv oix daix Yo^han mv baac ninh gamh nziex baeqc fingx weic zuqc Yiutai Mienh taaih Yo^han zoux dauh douc waac mienh.
14.27: Yesu liemh zeih gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, “Gunv bungx hnyouv maah! Se dongh yie, maiv dungx gamh nziex.”
14.14: Yesu cuotv nzangv faaux mbienx mingh, buatc mienh camv haic. Ninh haiz korv-lienh haic ninh mbuo, ziouc zorc longx nzengc ninh mbuo nyei baengc.
14.3: Zinh ndaangc Helotv, laaix ninh nyei youz Filipv nyei auv, He^lo^ndietc, zorqv Yo^han ndoh jienv dorh mingh wuonx loh,
14.7: ziouc laengz waac bun wuov dauh sieqv, “Maiv gunv meih oix longc haaix nyungc, yie laengz bun meih aqv.”
14.36: tov Yesu bun baengc mienh kungx hluo zuqc ninh nyei lui-juoqv. Haaix dauh hluo zuqc, baengc ziouc longx mi'aqv.
14.10: Ninh paaiv mienh mingh wuov loh hngaqv ndutv Yo^han nyei m'nqorngv.
14.2: ziouc mbuox ninh nyei sin-hlen mienh, “Naaiv dauh ndongc haaix zungv dongh tengx mienh jiex wuom nyei leiz wuov dauh Yo^han aengx nangh daaih aqv, ninh cingx daaih maaih naaiv nyungc qaqv zoux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic.”
14.1: Wuov zanc gunv Gaa^li^li Saengv wuov dauh Helotv Hungh muangx haiz Yesu nyei jauv-louc
14.31: Yesu liemh zeih sung buoz nanv jienv ninh yaac gorngv, “Meih sienx duqv hei haic. Meih nyei hnyouv weic haaix diuc mbungh mbienv?”
14.6: Zoux gau, taux Helotv nyei sih nyietv-hnoi, He^lo^ndietc nyei sieqv yiem zuangx kaeqv mienh nyei nza'hmien cangx heix. Helotv gengh a'hneiv haic
14.8: Naaiv dauh sieqv ziux ninh nyei maa mbuox nyei waac gorngv, “Tov ih zanc zorqv tengx mienh jiex wuom nyei leiz wuov dauh Yo^han nyei m'nqorngv an jienv torqv-sienx dorh daaih bun yie oc.”
14.24: Doix wuov norm ziangh hoc sai-gorx mbuo nyei nzangv leih mbienx go haic aqv. Nzangv zuqc wuom-laangc mietv mingh mietv daaih nyei, laaix nziaaux ndungc jienv.
14.25: Lungh aav lamh njang, buo norm taux juqv norm ziangh hoc mbu'ndongx, Yesu yangh wuom-minc mingh sai-gorx mbuo wuov.
14.29: Yesu gorngv, “Daaih maah!” Bide ziouc cuotv nzangv yangh wuom-minc hungx jienv Yesu mingh.
14.11: Ninh mbuo zorqv m'nqorngv daaih an jienv torqv-sienx bouh daaih bun wuov dauh sieqv. Sieqv yaac jiu bun ninh nyei maa.
14.32: Ninh mbuo i dauh bieqc nzangv. Nziaaux ziang naaic dingh mi'aqv.
14.16: Yesu dau, “Ninh mbuo maiv zuqc mingh lorqc. Meih mbuo ganh lorz bun ninh mbuo nyanc maah!”

3.15: Yesu dau Yo^han, “Meih gunv tengx yie aqv. Mbuo hnangv naaiv zoux, se zoux duqv horpc nzengc ei Tin-Hungh oix mbuo zoux nyei.” Yo^han ziouc tengx aqv.
3.12: Ninh nyei buoz nanv jienv ga'naaiv-cenv, oix fioux nzengc ninh nyei mborqv mbiauh ciangv yaac siou ninh nyei mbiauh dapv lamz. Mv baac cuqv-maux ninh oix longc yietc liuz maiv haih daic nyei douz buov jienv.”
3.13: Wuov zanc Yesu yiem Gaa^li^li mingh Jor^ndaen Ndaaih, oix Yo^han tengx ninh jiex wuom nyei leiz.
3.5: Mienh yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh caux gormx Yu^ndie Saengv caux Jor^ndaen Ndaaih hlen yietc zungv horngc zaangc nyei dorngx, cuotv mingh lorz Yo^han.
3.11: “Yie longc wuom tengx meih mbuo jiex leiz, bun cing meih mbuo goiv hnyouv guangc zuiz. Mv baac yie daaih ndaangc, aengx maaih dauh nqa'haav daaih. Ninh zoux gauh hlo yie. Yie zungv maiv puix tengx ninh hnengx heh. Ninh oix longc Singx Lingh yaac longc douz tengx meih mbuo jiex leiz.
3.14: Mv baac Yo^han oix Yesu goiv za'eix, ninh ziouc gorngv, “Horpc zuqc meih tengx yie jiex leiz, mv baac meih daaih lorz yie?”
3.3: Douc waac mienh, I^saa^yaa, gorngv nyei, se dongh naaiv dauh Yo^han aqv. I^saa^yaa gorngv, “Maaih laanh mienh yiem deic-bung-huaang heuc jienv gorngv, ‘Oix zuqc liuc leiz Ziouv nyei jauv. Ninh nyei jauv oix zuqc koi zaqc nyei.’+”
3.10: Ih zanc mbenc ziangx bouv, zungv an jienv ndiangx-gorn. Haaix diuh ndiangx ziangh biouv maiv kuv, oix zuqc goix guangc buov douz mingh.
3.2: Ninh gorngv, “Oix zuqc goiv hnyouv guangc meih mbuo nyei zuiz, weic zuqc Tin-Hungh daaih zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei ziangh hoc taux fatv aqv.”
3.1: Ziangh hoc taux, tengx mienh jiex wuom nyei leiz wuov dauh Yo^han mingh wuov Yu^ndie Deic-Bung-Huaang zunh doz.
3.4: Yo^han zuqv nyei lui-houx longc lorh torh biei ndatv daaih, yaac longc ndopv-hlaang sai jienv jaaiv. Ninh nyanc nyei ga'naaiv se jopv-nyeic caux lomc nyei mueiz-dorngh.
3.6: Ninh mbuo nyiemc ninh mbuo nyei zuiz, Yo^han ziouc yiem wuov Jor^ndaen Ndaaih tengx ninh mbuo jiex wuom nyei leiz.
3.8: Meih mbuo zoux sic oix zuqc bun cing meih mbuo goiv hnyouv guangc zuiz.
3.9: Yaac maiv dungx yiem hnyouv hnamv, ‘Yie mbuo maaih Apc^laa^ham zoux yie mbuo nyei ong-taaix.’ Yie mbuox meih mbuo, Tin-Hungh zungv haih zorqv naaiv deix la'bieiv zoux benx Apc^laa^ham nyei zeiv-fun.’
3.7: Yo^han buatc Faa^li^si Mienh caux Saa^ndu^si Mienh camv nyei daaih lorz ninh, oix jiex wuom nyei leiz ziouc gorngv ninh mbuo. Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo naaic ndui naang-doqc nyei buonv aah! Tin-Hungh dingc zuiz  nyei ziangh hoc oix taux. Haaix dauh kuinx meih mbuo biaux ndutv?
3.17: Maaih qiex yiem gu'nguaaic lungh gorngv, “Naaiv se yie nyei Dorn-hnamv. Yie za'gengh a'hneiv haic ninh.”
3.16: Yesu jiex leiz yiem wuom yietv cuotv daaih wuov zanc, lungh ziouc nqoi. Yesu buatc Tin-Hungh nyei Singx Lingh njiec daaih hnangv norqc nqo nor, yaac nzopc jienv ninh.

7.21: “Heuc jienv yie, ‘Ziouv aah! Ziouv!’ wuov deix mienh, maiv zeiz dauh dauh haih duqv bieqc Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv. Kungx dongh ei yie nyei tin-dorngh Diex nyei eix zoux wuov deix duqv bieqc hnangv.
7.15: “Oix zuqc mbungh jienv jaav douc waac mienh. Ninh mbuo daaih lorz meih mbuo wuov zanc, beih zaangc hnangv ba'gi yungh, mv baac ninh mbuo nyei hnyouv ciouv hnangv hieh juv nor.
7.12: “Meih mbuo oix mienh hnangv haaix nor zoux bun meih mbuo, meih mbuo yaac oix zuqc hnangv wuov nor zoux bun mienh. Mose nyei Leiz caux Douc Waac Mienh njaaux nyei waac, nzutv zunv gorngv se dongh naaiv aqv.
7.17: Ndiangx longx ziangh longx nyei biouv. Ndiangx maiv benx ziangh maiv benx nyei biouv.
7.20: Hnangv naaic, meih mbuo buatc ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic meih mbuo ziouc zieqv duqv jaav douc waac mienh aqv.
7.4: Ganh nyei m'zing maaih nqanx ndiangx, meih fungc haih mbuox meih nyei gorx-youz, ‘Gorx aac, yie tengx gorx ban cuotv m'zing nyei la'fapv oc.’
7.28: Yesu gorngv liuz naaiv deix waac, zuangx mienh mbuoqc horngh haic ninh njaaux nyei waac,
7.19: Haaix diuh ndiangx ziangh biouv maiv benx, zungv zuqc goix guangc buov douz.
7.18: Ndiangx longx maiv haih ziangh maiv benx nyei biouv. Maiv benx nyei ndiangx maiv haih ziangh longx nyei biouv.
7.22: Taux siemv zuiz wuov hnoi mienh camv nyei oix mbuox yie, ‘Ziouv aah! Ziouv! Yie mbuo dengv meih nyei mbuox douc Tin-Hungh nyei waac, yaac zunc mienv cuotv, yaac zoux jiex mbuoqc horngh nyei sic camv.’
7.23: Wuov zanc yie oix gorngv mbuox ninh mbuo, ‘Yie liemh maiv hiuv duqv meih mbuo niaa. Meih mbuo zoux waaic nyei mienh gaanv biaux nqoi maah!’
7.13: “Oix zuqc bieqc hepc wuov dauh gaengh, weic zuqc dorh mienh mingh zuqc mietc wuov dauh gaengh jangv nyei. Jauv yaac kuh yangh nyei. Yangh wuov diuh jauv nyei mienh camv haic.
7.9: “Meih mbuo haaix dauh mienh, ninh nyei dorn tov njuov, meih oix bun la'bieiv ninh fai?
7.26: “Mv baac haaix dauh haiz liuz yie naaiv deix waac yaac maiv ei jienv zoux, ziouc hnangv dauh mienh hngongx mienh nor. Naaiv dauh gomv biauv yiem saa-ziou gu'nguaaic.
7.5: Beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh aah! Oix zuqc zorqv cuotv ganh nyei m'zing wuov nqanx ndiangx ndaangc cingx daaih haih mangc duqv zien tengx gorx-youz ban cuotv m'zing nyei la'fapv.
7.27: Duih domh mbiungc, wuom hlo guaatv, borngz domh nziaaux buonc biauv, biauv ziouc mbaang. Lomz! lomz nyei mbaang mi'aqv.”
7.14: Mv baac bieqc mingh duqv yietc liuz nyei maengc wuov dauh gaengh se hepc nyei. Jauv yaac aqc duqv yangh. Lorz buatc wuov diuh jauv nyei mienh zoqc.
7.3: “Meih weic haaix diuc buatc meih nyei gorx-youz nyei m'zing maaih la'fapv yaac maiv hnamv taux meih ganh nyei m'zing maaih nqanx ndiangx?
7.7: “Oix zuqc tov ziouc duqv, oix zuqc lorz ziouc buatc, oix zuqc ngaengv gaengh, gaengh ziouc nqoi.
7.10: Dorn tov mbiauz, meih oix bun naang ninh fai?
7.2: weic zuqc meih mbuo hnangv haaix nor dingc mienh nyei zuiz, Tin-Hungh yaac hnangv wuov nor dingc meih mbuo nyei zuiz aqv. Meih mbuo longc haaix nyungc hlaau bun mienh, Tin-Hungh yaac longc wuov nyungc hlaau bun meih mbuo.
7.1: “Maiv dungx dingc mienh nyei zuiz, Tin-Hungh ziouc maiv dingc meih mbuo nyei zuiz,
7.6: “Maiv dungx zorqv cing-nzengc nyei ga'naaiv bun juv. Gamh nziex juv haih daaux sin daaih ngaatc meih mbuo. Yaac maiv dungx zorqv jaaix nyei la'bieiv-zou zoi bun dungz. Dungz kungx oix caaiv waaic hnangv.
7.8: Weic zuqc haaix dauh tov ziouc duqv, haaix dauh lorz ziouc buatc. Haaix dauh ngaengv gaengh, gaengh ziouc nqoi.
7.24: “Hnangv naaiv, haaix dauh haiz liuz yie naaiv deix waac, yaac ei jienv zoux, se hnangv yietc dauh cong-mengh nyei mienh gomv biauv la'bieiv-baengh gu'nguaaic.
7.25: Duih domh mbiungc, wuom hlo guaatv, borngz domh nziaaux buonc biauv, biauv yaac maiv mbaang, weic zuqc gomv la'bieiv-baengh gu'nguaaic.
7.29: weic zuqc ninh njaaux maiv hnangv ninh mbuo nyei njaaux leiz fin-saeng. Ninh nyei waac maaih hatc maaz haic.
7.11: Meih mbuo ndongc naaic waaic nyei mienh zungv hiuv duqv bun longx nyei ga'naaiv meih mbuo nyei fu'jueiv, meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex yietc zei oix bun longx nyei ga'naaiv tov ninh wuov deix mienh.
7.16: Meih mbuo samx mangc ninh mbuo zoux nyei sic meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv ninh mbuo aqv. Ndiangx-njimv maiv haih ziangh a'ngunc biouv. Mungv long njimv yaac maiv haih ziangh ngongh nyorx biouv.

10.21: “Muoz-dorn doic, laanh oix zorqv laanh jiu bun mienh daix. Die yaac oix zorqv ninh nyei fu'jueiv jiu bun mienh daix. Fu'jueiv caux diex maac yaac oix benx win, ziouc jiu bun mienh daix.
10.15: Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, taux siemv zuiz wuov hnoi, So^ndom Zingh caux Go^mo^laa Zingh oix zuqc dingc zuiz zungv gauh heng wuov norm mungv.
10.37: “Haaix dauh hnamv diex maac gauh camv ninh hnamv yie, se maiv puix gan yie zoux sai-gorx. Haaix dauh hnamv ninh nyei naamh nyouz gauh camv ninh hnamv yie, wuov dauh yaac maiv puix zoux yie nyei sai-gorx.
10.12: Bieqc biauv wuov zanc, oix zuqc tov Tin-Hungh bun baengh orn wuov buonc mienh.
10.17: Oix zuqc faix fim. Mienh oix zorqv meih mbuo dorh mingh gunv sic wuic. Yiem ninh mbuo nyei wuic dorngh ninh mbuo yaac oix longc biaav-bin mborqv meih mbuo.
10.30: Liemh meih mbuo nyei mba'biei zungv saauv nzengc mi'aqv.
10.20: weic zuqc maiv zeiz meih mbuo ganh hnamv cuotv waac gorngv. Meih mbuo nyei Zaangc Diex nyei Singx Lingh ganh longc meih mbuo gorngv.
10.4: Maaih hnamv guoqv zaangc wuov dauh Simon. Yaac maaih maaic Yesu wuov dauh Yu^ndaatc I^saa^kaa^li^otc.
10.28: Maiv dungx gamh nziex mienh. Ninh mbuo haih daix sin mv baac maiv haih daix lingh wuonh. Daaux nzuonx oix zuqc gamh nziex Tin-Hungh. Tin-Hungh haih bun liemh sin liemh lingh wuonh ndortv deic nyuoqc zuqc mietc.
10.33: Mv baac haaix dauh dorng zuangx maiv nyiemc yie, yie yiem yie nyei tin-dorngh Diex nyei nza'hmien yaac maiv nyiemc wuov dauh.
10.35: Yie daaih weic bun “+‘dorn caux die maiv horpc, sieqv caux maa maiv horpc, mbuangz caux maa-buoc maiv horpc.
10.42: Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, haaix dauh bun korqv wuom-namx yietc dauh naaiv deix faix jiex nyei sai-gorx hopv weic zuqc ninh zoux yie nyei sai-gorx, wuov dauh nyei zingh nyeic za'gengh maiv haih ndortv.”
10.19: Ninh mbuo dorh mingh zaah naaic wuov zanc, maiv dungx nzauh oix zuqc gorngv haaix nyungc fai oix zuqc hnangv haaix nor gorngv. Taux ziangh hoc, dongh meih mbuo oix zuqc gorngv nyei waac, Tin-Hungh oix bun meih mbuo gorngv,
10.34: “Maiv dungx hnamv yie daaih weic bun baamh gen taaix-baengh. Yie maiv zeiz daaih weic bun baamh gen taaix-baengh, yie dorh nzuqc ndaauv daaih.
10.18: Meih mbuo laaix yie oix zuqc mienh dorh meih mbuo mingh yiem zungx caux hungh diex nyei nza'hmien weic kuv fienx zoux zorng-zengx bun ninh mbuo caux Janx muangx.
10.22: Weic yie, zuangx mienh oix nzorng meih mbuo, mv baac haaix dauh diev duqv taux daauh ziouc duqv njoux aqv.
10.23: Meih mbuo yiem yietc norm mungv zuqc mienh zoux doqc, oix zuqc biaux mingh ganh norm mungv. Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, meih mbuo mingh I^saa^laa^en Deic-Bung nyei norm-norm laangz zoux meih mbuo nyei gong maiv gaengh ziangx, yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, ziouc taux aqv.
10.13: Se gorngv wuov buonc mienh a'hneiv zipv meih mbuo nor, bun meih mbuo tov nyei baengh orn yiem wuov norm biauv. Se gorngv ninh mbuo maiv zipv meih mbuo nor, oix zuqc siou meih mbuo tov nyei baengh orn nzuonx.
10.9: Meih mbuo nyei nyaanh mbuoqc, maiv dungx dapv jiem fai nyaanh fai dongh zinh dorh mingh.
10.40: “Haaix dauh zipv meih mbuo, ninh yaac zipv yie. Haaix dauh zipv yie, ninh yaac zipv paaiv yie daaih wuov dauh.
10.26: “Hnangv naaic, maiv dungx gamh nziex mienh. Maiv maaih haaix nyungc gem jienv maiv zuqc cuotv yaangh. Maiv maaih haaix nyungc bingx jienv, mienh maiv haih hiuv.
10.41: Haaix dauh zipv dauh douc waac mienh weic zuqc ninh zoux douc waac mienh, wuov dauh ziouc duqv zipv zingh nyeic hnangv douc waac mienh zipv nyei zingh nyeic nor. Haaix dauh zipv kuv mienh weic zuqc ninh zoux kuv mienh, wuov dauh ziouc duqv zipv zingh nyeic hnangv kuv mienh zipv nor.
10.5: Yesu paaiv naaiv deix ziepc nyeic dauh gong-zoh cuotv mingh wuov zanc, ninh yaac njaaux ziangx. Ninh gorngv, “Maiv dungx mingh haaix fingx Janx nyei deic-bung. Yaac maiv dungx bieqc Saa^maa^lie Deic-Bung nyei haaix norm mungv.
10.27: Yie yiem hmuangx zong bingx jienv mbuox meih mbuo nyei sic, meih mbuo oix zuqc yiem njang zong gorngv cuotv daaih. Meih mbuo yiem m'normh gorn haiz nyei waac-sapv, oix zuqc yiem wuov biauv-ngorh zunh mbuox mienh.
10.38: Haaix dauh maiv ndaam jienv ninh ganh nyei ziepc nzaangc jaax gan jienv yie mingh, wuov dauh maiv puix zoux yie nyei sai-gorx.
10.14: Haaix norm biauv fai haaix norm mungv maiv zipv meih mbuo fai maiv muangx meih mbuo nyei waac, oix zuqc cuotv wuov norm dorngx yaac fengx guoqv zaux nyei nie-mbung guangc wuov.
10.3: Maaih Filipv caux Mbaa^to^lo^miu, maaih Tomatv caux siou nzou wuov dauh Matv^taai, maaih An^fe^atc nyei Dorn, Yaagorpc, caux Tatv^nde^atc.
10.7: Meih mbuo yietc binc mingh yietc binc zunh mbuox mienh, ‘Tin-Hungh daaih zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei ziangh hoc taux fatv aqv.’
10.39: Haaix dauh kungx oix goux ninh ganh nyei maengc, wuov dauh ziouc zuqc guangc ninh nyei maengc. Mv baac haaix dauh weic yie guangc ninh nyei maengc, wuov dauh ziouc duqv maengc ziangh aqv.
10.36: Biauv zong mienh ziouc benx ganh nyei win-wangv aqv.’
10.10: Cuotv jauv, maiv zuqc dorh mbuoqc dapv ga'naaiv, maiv dungx dorh lui-yienc, fai heh, fai biaav-mbiaac. Gong-mienh horpc zuqc duqv ninh qiemx longc nyei ga'naaiv.
10.2: Naaiv deix ziepc nyeic dauh gong-zoh nyei mbuox se maaih hnangv naaiv. Da'yietv dauh heuc Simon, aengx maaih norm mbuox heuc Bide. Aengx maaih ninh nyei youz, An^ndaa^lu. Maaih Se^mbe^ndi nyei Dorn, Yaagorpc, caux Yaagorpc nyei youz, Yo^han.
10.1: Yesu heuc ninh nyei ziepc nyeic dauh sai-gorx daaih zunv, jiu hatc maaz bun ninh mbuo haih zunc hieh guaiv mienv cuotv yaac haih zorc nyungc-nyungc baengc longx.
10.31: Hnangv naaic maiv dungx gamh nziex. Meih mbuo zungv gauh jaaix jiex norqc meix camv.
10.6: Kungx oix zuqc mingh lorz I^saa^laa^en Mienh. Ninh mbuo se hnangv dingx laaih nyei ba'gi yungh nor.
10.8: Oix zuqc zorc baengc, heuc daic mingh nyei mienh nangh daaih, zorc longx butv gomh huv baengc nyei mienh, yaac zunc mienv cuotv. Meih mbuo baeqc baeqc duqv daaih nyei yaac oix zuqc baeqc baeqc bun.
10.24: “Horqc saeng maiv gauh hlo ninh nyei fin-saeng. Nouh maiv gauh hlo ninh nyei ziouv.
10.25: Se gorngv horqc saeng haih duqv hnangv ninh nyei fin-saeng, nouh haih duqv hnangv ninh nyei ziouv, oix zuqc buangv hnyouv aqv. Se gorngv biauv-ziouv zuqc mienh heuc zoux Mbe^en^se^mbun mienv, biauv zong mienh yietc zei oix zuqc mienh heuc gauh waaic jiex nyei mbuox.
10.29: I norm norqc meix maaic duqv yietc norm dongh zinh hnangv. Mv baac cuotv liuz meih mbuo nyei Zaangc Diex nyei eix, yietc norm norqc meix maiv ndortv njiec ndau.
10.11: “Meih mbuo bieqc haaix norm laangz, haaix norm mungv, oix zuqc samx mangc gaax, yiem wuov maaih haaix dauh puix duqv meih mbuo hitv ninh nyei biauv. Hitv haaix dauh nyei biauv, oix zuqc hitv taux aengx cuotv wuov norm dorngx.
10.32: “Haaix dauh dorng zuangx nyiemc yie, yie yiem yie nyei tin-dorngh Diex nyei nza'hmien yaac oix nyiemc wuov dauh.
10.16: “Muangx longx oc. Yie paaiv meih mbuo cuotv mingh, se hnangv bungx ba'gi yungh bieqc hieh juv guanh gu'nyuoz nor. Meih mbuo oix zuqc hnangv naang nor guai. Yaac hnangv baeqc gopv nor suonc.

2.21: Yosepv ziouc jiez sin dorh jienv fu'jueiv caux fu'jueiv nyei maa nzuonx I^saa^laa^en Deic-Bung aqv.
2.15: yiem wuov zuov taux Helotv daic mingh. Hnangv naaic cuotv daaih weic bun doix nzengc Ziouv longc douc waac mienh gorngv nyei waac. Ninh gorngv, “Yie heuc yie nyei dorn yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung cuotv daaih.”
2.12: Tin-Hungh box mbeix mbuox wuov deix domh fin-saeng maiv dungx nzuonx Helotv wuov. Ninh mbuo ziouc yangh ganh diuh jauv nzuonx ninh mbuo nyei deic-bung.
2.17: Naaiv deix sic cuotv daaih doix nzengc wuov dauh douc waac mienh, Ye^le^mi, nyei waac. Ye^le^mi gorngv,
2.20: Fin-mienh gorngv, “Jiez sin daaih, dorh wuov dauh fu'jueiv caux jienv fu'jueiv nyei maa nzuonx I^saa^laa^en Deic-Bung aqv oc. Weic zuqc oix hoic naaiv dauh fu'jueiv nyei maengc wuov deix daic nzengc mi'aqv.”
2.4: Helotv ziouc heuc Yiutai Mienh nyei zuangx sai mienh bieiv caux njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng daaih nzoih yiem zunv ziouc naaic ninh mbuo, “Zoux Giduc wuov dauh oix cuotv seix yiem haaix?”
2.19: Helotv Hungh daic mi'aqv. Yiem I^yipv Deic-Bung maaih dauh Ziouv nyei fin-mienh daaih box mbeix Yosepv.
2.18: “Haiz mienh yiem wuov Laamaa Zingh mbiouh mbiouh bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv. Laasen nyiemv ninh nyei fu'jueiv, ninh yaac maiv longc haaix dauh tengx ninh jaiv nzauh, weic zuqc ninh nyei fu'jueiv daic mi'aqv.”
2.22: Mv baac haiz gorngv Aan^ke^laa^atc nzipc ninh nyei die, Helotv, zoux Yu^ndie Saengv nyei hungh, Yosepv ziouc gamh nziex maiv mingh wuov aqv. Tin-Hungh yaac box mbeix donv Yosepv, Yosepv mbuo ziouc mingh Gaa^li^li Saengv,
2.23: yiem norm mungv mbuox heuc Naa^saa^letv. Naaiv deix jauv cuotv daaih doix nzengc douc waac mienh nyei waac. Wuov deix douc waac mienh gorngv, “Mienh oix heuc ninh zoux Naa^saa^letv Mienh.”
2.13: Wuov deix domh fin-saeng nzuonx mi'aqv. Maaih dauh Ziouv nyei fin-mienh box mbeix mbuox Yosepv, “Jiez sin daaih, dorh jienv fu'jueiv caux ninh nyei maa biaux mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung. Oix zuqc yiem wuov zuov taux yie mbuox meih, weic zuqc Helotv oix lorz naaiv dauh fu'jueiv daix.”
2.9: Muangx hungh diex gorngv liuz, wuov deix domh fin-saeng ziouc cuotv jauv mingh aqv. Zinh ndaangc yiem dong bung buatc cuotv wuov norm hleix mingh ndaangc ninh mbuo. Mingh taux fu'jueiv yiem wuov norm dorngx gu'nguaaic ziouc dingh jienv wuov.
2.5: Ninh mbuo dau, “Yiem Yu^ndie Saengv, Mbetc^le^hem Mungv, weic zuqc douc waac mienh hnangv naaiv nor fiev,
2.14: Yosepv ziouc jiez sin daaih, lungh muonz zanc dorh jienv wuov dauh fu'jueiv caux fu'jueiv nyei maa biaux mingh I^yipv Deic-Bung,
2.3: Helotv Hungh muangx haiz naaiv deix waac ninh ziouc hnyouv maiv henh yietc deix. Yiem Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh nyei zuangx mienh yietc zungv yaac hnyouv maiv henh nzengc.
2.7: Helotv ziouc heuc wuov deix samx hleix nyei domh fin-saeng daaih, bingx jienv longx-longx nyei naaic gaax, “Wuov norm hleix ziangh haaix cuotv daaih?”
2.10: Domh fin-saeng buatc wuov norm hleix ziouc njien-youh orn-lorqc haic.
2.2: naaic gaax, “Cuotv seix daaih zoux Yiutai Mienh nyei hungh wuov dauh gu'nguaaz yiem haaix? Yie mbuo buatc ninh nyei hleix yiem dong bung cuotv ziouc daaih baaix ninh.”
2.1: Yesu cuotv seix yiem Yu^ndie Saengv, Mbetc^le^hem Mungv wuov zanc, doix zuqc Helotv zoux hungh diex. Nqa'haav maaih deix samx hleix nyei domh fin-saeng yiem dong bung daaih taux Ye^lu^saa^lem Zingh
2.6: ‘Yu^ndaa Deic-Bung, Mbetc^le^hem Mungv aah! Yiem Yu^ndaa Deic-Bung nyei domh zingh, meih maiv zeiz gauh faix jiex. Weic zuqc maaih dauh domh jien oix yiem meih naaic cuotv daaih dorh yie nyei baeqc fingx, I^saa^laa^en Mienh.’+”
2.8: Naaic liuz, Helotv ziouc mbuox ninh mbuo mingh Mbetc^le^hem Mungv. Ninh gorngv, “Meih mbuo gunv mingh Mbetc^le^hem Mungv longx-longx nyei lorz wuov dauh fu'jueiv. Lorz buatc, nzuonx daaih mbuox yie, yie ziouc haih mingh baaix ninh.”
2.11: Bieqc biauv mingh, buatc wuov dauh fu'jueiv caux ninh nyei maa, Maa^li^yaa, ziouc gueic njiec ndau baaix wuov dauh fu'jueiv. Ninh mbuo zorqv ninh mbuo dorh daaih nyei zingh nyeic cuotv daaih fongc horc bun ninh. Maaih jiem caux i nyungc ndaang nyei ndiangx-zung heuc mu^yorc caux faan^gen^sen.
2.16: Helotv Hungh hiuv duqv wuov deix domh fin-saeng nduov ninh, ninh ziouc qiex jiez! haic. Ninh njiec lingc daix nzengc Mbetc^le^hem Mungv caux huing nzuonx nyei dorngx wuov deix i hnyangx ga'ndiev maengx nyei gu'nguaaz-dorn. Helotv hnangv naaiv nor daix naaiv deix fu'jueiv ei ninh naaic samx hleix nyei domh fin-saeng buatc hleix cuotv nyei ziangh hoc funx daaih.

1.21: Ninh oix duqv dauh dorn. Meih oix zuqc tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Yesu, weic zuqc ninh oix njoux ninh nyei baeqc fingx leih ndutv ninh mbuo nyei zuiz.”
1.15: E^li^utc zoux E^le^aa^saa nyei die. E^le^aa^saa zoux Matv^taan nyei die. Matv^taan zoux Yaakopv nyei die.
1.12: Zuqc caangv mingh liuz, nqa'haav Ye^ko^ni^yaa zoux Se^an^ti^en nyei die. Se^an^ti^en zoux Se^lupv^mbaa^mben nyei die.
1.17: Hnangv naaic, yiem Apc^laa^ham mingh taux Ndaawitv Hungh maaih ziepc feix doic mienh. Aengx yiem Ndaawitv Hungh mingh taux I^saa^laa^en Mienh zuqc guaatv mingh Mbaa^mbi^lon Deic-Bung maaih ziepc feix doic. Aengx yiem zuqc guaatv mingh nyei ziangh hoc taux Giduc cuotv seix wuov zanc, maaih ziepc feix doic.
1.20: Yosepv yiem hnyouv hnangv naaiv nor hnamv. Maaih dauh Ziouv nyei fin-mienh daaih box mbeix mbuox ninh, “Ndaawitv nyei zeiv-fun, Yosepv aah! Maiv dungx gamh nziex. Gunv longc Maa^li^yaa zoux meih nyei auv aqv oc. Ninh maaih jienv wuov norm sin se Singx Lingh bun ninh maaih.
1.4: Laam zoux Am^mi^naa^ndapc nyei die. Am^mi^naa^ndapc zoux Naason nyei die. Naason zoux Sanx^mon nyei die.
1.19: Ninh nyei nqox, Yosepv, se kuv mienh yaac maiv oix bun Maa^li^yaa dorng zuangx zuqc nyaiv. Ninh ziouc yiem hnyouv hnamv oix beic ndiev tuix.
1.18: Yesu Giduc cuotv seix nyei jauv-louc se hnangv naaiv. Yesu nyei maa, mbuox heuc Maa^li^yaa. Yosepv gorngv ziangh ninh mi'aqv. Ninh mbuo maiv gaengh juangc dorngx bueix jiex mv baac Maa^li^yaa maaih sin aqv, se yiem Singx Lingh nyei qaqv daaih.
1.22: Naaiv deix sic cuotv daaih weic bun doix nzengc zinh ndaangc Ziouv longc wuov dauh douc waac mienh gorngv nyei waac. Ninh gorngv,
1.23: “Maaih dauh maiv nziaauc jiex dorn nyei sieqv, oix maaih norm sin, yungz duqv dauh dorn. Ninh mbuo oix cuotv mbuox heuc I^maa^nu^en.” (Eix leiz se “Tin-Hungh caux mbuo yiem.”)
1.13: Se^lupv^mbaa^mben zoux Aa^mbi^yutv nyei die. Aa^mbi^yutv zoux E^li^yaa^kim nyei die. E^li^yaa^kim zoux Aasor nyei die.
1.9: Utc^si^yaa zoux Yotaam nyei die. Yotaam zoux Aa^hatc nyei die. Aa^hatc zoux He^se^ki^yaa nyei die.
1.5: Sanx^mon zoux Mbo^aatc nyei die. Mbo^aatc nyei maa heuc Laa^hapc. Mbo^aatc zoux O^mbetc nyei die. O^mbetc nyei maa heuc Lu^te. O^mbetc zoux Jetc^si nyei die.
1.14: Aasor zoux Saax^ndokc nyei die. Saax^ndokc zoux Aakim nyei die. Aakim zoux E^li^utc nyei die.
1.3: Yu^ndaa zoux Beletv caux Zelaa nyei die. Ninh mbuo nyei maa heuc Taamaa. Beletv zoux Hetv^lon nyei die. Hetv^lon zoux Laam nyei die.
1.7: Saa^lo^morn zoux Le^hox^mbo^am nyei die. Le^hox^mbo^am zoux Aa^mbi^yaa nyei die. Aa^mbi^yaa zoux Aasaax nyei die.
1.10: He^se^ki^yaa zoux Maa^natv^se nyei die. Maa^natv^se zoux Aamon nyei die. Aamon zoux Yo^si^yaa nyei die.
1.2: Apc^laa^ham zoux I^sakc nyei die. I^sakc zoux Yaakopv nyei die. Yaakopv zoux Yu^ndaa mbuo muoz-dorn doic nyei die.
1.1: Yesu Giduc zoux Ndaawitv Hungh nyei zeiv-fun. Ndaawitv Hungh yaac zoux Apc^laa^ham nyei zeiv-fun. Ih zanc fiev naaiv se Yesu Giduc doic jiex doic nyei douh zong.
1.6: Jetc^si zoux Ndaawitv Hungh nyei die. Ndaawitv Hungh zoux Saa^lo^morn nyei die. Saa^lo^morn nyei maa zinh ndaangc zoux U^li^yaa nyei auv.
1.8: Aasaax zoux Ye^ho^saa^fatv nyei die. Ye^ho^saa^fatv zoux Yolam nyei die. Yolam zoux Utc^si^yaa nyei die.
1.24: Yosepv nyie daaih, ninh ei jienv Ziouv nyei fin-mienh mbuox nyei waac zoux, ziouc dorh Maa^li^yaa daaih zoux ninh nyei auv aqv.
1.25: Mv baac ninh mbuo maiv nitv doic taux Maa^li^yaa duqv naaiv dauh dorn daaih. Yosepv tengx wuov dauh dorn cuotv mbuox heuc Yesu.
1.11: Yo^si^yaa zoux Ye^ko^ni^yaa mbuo muoz-doic nyei die. Wuov zanc doix zuqc I^saa^laa^en Mienh zuqc caangv mingh Mbaa^mbi^lon Deic-Bung.
1.16: Yaakopv zoux Yosepv nyei die. Yosepv se Maa^li^yaa nyei nqox. Maa^li^yaa zoux Yesu nyei maa. Yesu dongh mienh heuc Giduc wuov dauh.

6.21: Meih siou jaaix nyei ga'naaiv yiem haaix norm dorngx, meih nyei hnyouv haaix zanc yaac jangx jienv wuov aqv.
6.15: Mv baac mienh dorngc meih mbuo, meih mbuo yaac maiv guangc nor, meih mbuo nyei Zaangc Diex yaac maiv guangc meih mbuo nyei zuiz.
6.12: Tov guangc yie mbuo zoux nyei zuiz, hnangv yie mbuo guangc zoux dorngc yie mbuo wuov deix mienh nyei zuiz nor.
6.17: Meih mbuo zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc nzaaux nzengc hmien, zorqv youh nzaatv jienv mba'biei baic sung
6.30: Lomc nyei miev ih hnoi ziangh, njang hnoi kou nqaai, zuqc douz buov, mv baac Tin-Hungh zorng miev nzueic. Wuov nyungc, Tin-Hungh gauh oix zorng meih mbuo maiv zeiz? Meih mbuo sienx duqv hei haic weqv!
6.20: Oix zuqc weic ganh siou jaaix nyei ga'naaiv yiem wuov tin-dorngh weic zuqc maiv haih jiex sioux jiex nzingx. Gaeng yaac maiv haih ngaatc waaic. Janx-zaqc yaac maiv haih betv bieqc daaih nimc.
6.4: “Hnangv naaic, maiv maaih haaix dauh hiuv duqv meih zoux naaiv deix jauv, mv baac meih nyei Zaangc Diex, dongh mangc duqv buatc meih gem jienv zoux nyei sic, ziouc bun zingh nyeic meih aqv.
6.28: “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc laaix lui-houx kuonx hnyouv? Hnamv mangc gaax, lomc nyei baeqc horqc biangh hnangv haaix nor ziangh! Biangh maiv zoux gong, maiv baeng suix ndatv ndie.
6.33: Gauh longc jienv jiex, meih mbuo oix zuqc bun Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv meih mbuo ndaangc, yaac oix zuqc ei nzengc ninh nyei eix, naaiv deix yietc zungv nyei ga'naaiv ninh ziouc jaa tipv bun meih mbuo.
6.19: “Maiv dungx weic ganh siou jaaix nyei ga'naaiv yiem naaiv baamh gen, weic zuqc haih jiex sioux jiex nzingx nyei. Gaeng yaac haih ngaatc waaic nzengc. Janx-zaqc yaac haih betv bieqc daaih nimc.
6.34: Weic naaiv meih mbuo maiv dungx nzauh njang hnoi nyei sic. Njang hnoi nyei sic maaih gaux njang hnoi nzauh. Mouz hnoi maaih mouz hnoi nyei sic nzauh gaux aqv.
6.18: weic maiv bun mienh hiuv duqv meih zei. Kungx meih mangc maiv buatc nyei Zaangc Diex hiuv hnangv. Meih nyei Zaangc Diex, dongh mangc duqv buatc meih gem jienv zoux nyei sic, ziouc bun zingh nyeic meih aqv.
6.22: “M'zing beiv sin nyei dang. Se gorngv meih nyei m'zing njang nor, ziangh sin ziouc njang nzengc.
6.23: Meih nyei m'zing maiv njang nor, meih nyei sin ziouc hmuangx aqv. Hnangv naaic, se gorngv yiem meih gu'nyuoz nyei njang hmuangx mingh, ziouc za'gengh hmuangx haic aqv.
6.13: Maiv dungx bun yie mbuo buangh seix hnyouv nyei sic, mv baac njoux yie mbuo leih ndutv hiuang orqv wuov dauh. Weic zuqc meih yietc liuz maaih hungh lingc, maaih qaqv, maaih njang-laangc, taux maanc gouv maanc doic. Aamen.’
6.9: “Meih mbuo horpc zuqc hnangv naaiv nor daux gaux. ‘Yie mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex aah! Tov bun mienh taaih meih nyei cing-nzengc mbuox.
6.26: Mangc gaax, ndaix ndaamv-lungh nyei norqc! Ninh mbuo maiv zuangx haaix nyungc yaac maiv siou dapv lamz. Mv baac meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex uix ninh mbuo. Meih mbuo zungv gauh jaaix jiex norqc maiv zeiz?
6.5: “Meih mbuo haaix zanc daux gaux, maiv dungx zoux hnangv beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh. Ninh mbuo a'hneiv souv jienv wuov wuic dorngh yaac souv wuov jaai-horngc nyei jauv-caax daux gaux weic bun zuangx mienh buatc. Yie mbuox zien meih mbuo, ninh mbuo nyei zingh nyeic ninh mbuo duqv zipv liuz aqv.
6.27: Meih mbuo haaix dauh laaix kuonx hnyouv haih borqv duqv maengc ndaauv deix?
6.14: “Se gorngv mienh dorngc meih mbuo, meih mbuo yaac guangc bun ninh mbuo nor, meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex yaac guangc meih mbuo nyei zuiz.
6.3: Cuotv fim tengx mienh jomc mienh wuov zanc, liemh maiv dungx bun meih zuoqc jiex nyei loz-gaeng doic hiuv.
6.7: “Meih mbuo daux gaux nyei ziangh hoc, maiv dungx paan mingh puoqv nzuonx nyei gorngv hnangv maiv gaengh hiuv duqv Tin-Hungh wuov deix mienh nor. Ninh mbuo laaic gorngv waac camv Tin-Hungh cingx daaih muangx duqv haiz ninh mbuo daux gaux nyei waac.
6.10: Tov bun meih zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei hnoi taux. Tov bun yiem naaiv baamh gen nyungc-nyungc ei meih nyei eix cuotv daaih, hnangv yiem tin-dorngh nyungc-nyungc ei meih nyei eix cuotv daaih nor.
6.2: “Wuov nyungc, meih cuotv fim tengx mienh jomc mienh, maiv dungx hu hu hiaangv hiaangv nyei zoux, hnangv beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh yiem wuic dorngh yaac yiem jaai-horngc zoux, weic oix bun mienh ceng nor. Yie mbuox zien meih mbuo, ninh mbuo nyei zingh nyeic ninh mbuo duqv zipv liuz aqv.
6.1: “Meih mbuo oix zuqc faix fim. Tin-Hungh oix meih mbuo zoux nyei kuv sic maiv dungx dorng zuangx zoux weic bun mienh buatc. Se gorngv meih mbuo dorng zuangx zoux, meih mbuo maiv duqv zipv tin-dorngh Diex bun nyei zingh nyeic.
6.31: “Hnangv naaic, maiv dungx kuonx hnyouv gorngv, ‘Yie mbuo hnangv haaix nor haih lorz duqv nyanc lorz duqv hopv, lorz duqv lui-houx zuqv?’
6.6: Meih daux gaux nyei ziangh hoc, oix zuqc bieqc gen mingh, guon jienv gaengh, caux meih mangc maiv buatc nyei Zaangc Diex gorngv waac. Hnangv naaic, meih nyei Zaangc Diex, dongh mangc buatc meih gem jienv zoux nyei sic, ziouc bun zingh nyeic meih aqv.
6.8: Maiv dungx hnangv ninh mbuo nor zoux. Meih mbuo maiv gaengh tov, meih mbuo nyei Zaangc Diex zungv jaa-ndaangc hiuv duqv meih mbuo qiemx zuqc nyei nyungc-nyungc.
6.24: “Maiv maaih haaix dauh haih zoux duqv i dauh ziouv nyei bou. Hnangv naaic, ninh oix nzorng naaiv dauh, oix hnamv wuov dauh. Maiv zei aeqv, ninh oix taaih naaiv dauh, oix mangc piex wuov dauh. Meih mbuo maiv haih dongh dangh zoux Tin-Hungh nyei bou yaac zoux Nyaanh nyei bou.
6.25: “Weic naaiv yie gorngv mbuox meih mbuo, maiv dungx weic yungz maengc nyei nyanc hopv kuonx hnyouv. Yaac maiv dungx weic sin zaangc nyei lui-houx kuonx hnyouv. Maengc gauh jaaix jiex nyanc hopv maiv zeiz? Sin yaac gauh jaaix jiex lui-houx maiv zeiz?
6.29: Mv baac yie mbuox meih mbuo, liemh Saa^lo^morn Hungh ndongc naaic butv zoih, yaac maiv maaih zorng-zuqv ndongc yietc dorv naaiv deix biangh nzueic.
6.11: Yie mbuo hnoi-hnoi qiemx zuqc nyei nyanc hopv, tov bun gaux ih hnoi nyanc.
6.32: Maiv gaengh sienx Tin-Hungh wuov deix mienh haaix zanc yaac kungx lorz naaiv deix ga'naaiv hnangv. Meih mbuo nyei tin-dorngh Diex hiuv duqv meih mbuo qiemx zuqc longc naaiv deix ga'naaiv.
6.16: “Meih mbuo zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc wuov zanc, maiv dungx zoux hmien hmuangx hnangv beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh zoux. Ninh mbuo zoux hmien hmuangx hnangv kouv kouv wuov, oix zuangx mienh zieqv duqv ninh mbuo zei maiv nyanc haaix nyungc. Yie mbuox zien meih mbuo, ninh mbuo nyei zingh nyeic ninh mbuo duqv zipv liuz aqv.

8.21: Aengx maaih dauh sai-gorx mbuox Yesu, “Domh Gorx aac, yie tov nzuonx mingh biopv yie nyei die ndaangc.”
8.15: Yesu nanv ninh nyei buoz, sin ziouc laangh mi'aqv. Ninh ziouc jiez sin daaih fu-sux Yesu.
8.12: Mv baac horpc zuqc benx Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv nyei mienh wuov deix, daaux nzuonx zuqc zunc cuotv ga'nyiec hmuangx nyei dorngx, yiem wuov bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv, ngaatc jienv nyaah diev.”
8.17: Ninh hnangv naaiv zoux weic bun ninh zoux nyei sic cuotv daaih doix douc waac mienh, I^saa^yaa, gorngv nyei waac. I^saa^yaa gorngv, “Ninh ndaam yie mbuo nyei baengc tongx, yaac teix yie mbuo nyei zeqc naanc.”
8.30: Maaih yietc domh guanh dungz leih wuov go deix nyei lorz nyanc.
8.20: Yesu gorngv mbuox ninh, “Hieh juv maaih mbaengx-kuotv yiem, norqc yaac maaih lauz, mv baac yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, maiv maaih dorngx bueix hitv kuonx.”
8.4: Yesu aengx gorngv mbuox ninh, “Maiv dungx mbuox haaix dauh oc. Baeng zaqc nyei mingh sai mienh wuov bun ninh zaah mangc. Mangc liuz, oix zuqc ei Mose fiev nyei leiz dorh saeng-kuv mingh ziec bun Tin-Hungh weic saax meih nyei uix, zoux zorng-zengx bun ninh mbuo hiuv duqv meih nyei baengc longx nzengc.”
8.28: Yesu jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc koiv-dorn taux Gaa^ndaa^laa Deic. Maaih i dauh mienh yiem zouv-gemh cuotv daaih buangh zuqc Yesu. Naaiv deix i dauh mienh maaih mienv yiem ninh mbuo nyei sin, ninh mbuo ziouc ciouv haic. Maiv maaih haaix dauh gaamv yangh wuov diuh jauv.
8.33: Yungz dungz nyei mienh biaux bieqc mungv mingh, gorngv nzengc yietc zungv cuotv daaih nyei sic caux zinh ndaangc maaih mienv yiem sin wuov deix i dauh mienh nyei jauv-louc.
8.19: Wuov zanc maaih dauh njaaux leiz nyei fin-saeng daaih lorz Yesu. Ninh gorngv, “Fin-saeng aah! Maiv gunv fin-saeng mingh haaix, yie oix gan meih mingh aqv.”
8.34: Yietc zingh mienh ziouc cuotv mingh lorz Yesu. Lorz buatc, ninh mbuo qaqv tov Yesu cuotv ninh mbuo nyei deic-jaaix mingh.
8.18: Yesu buatc mienh camv weih gormx ninh, ziouc mbuox sai-gorx mbuo dorh ninh jiex wuov ngaanc ziqc koiv-dorn.
8.22: Yesu dau, “Sueih janx-daic ganh biopv ninh mbuo ganh nyei janx-daic aqv. Gan jienv yie daaih maah!”
8.23: Yesu bieqc nzangv, sai-gorx mbuo yaac gan jienv bieqc.
8.13: Yesu aengx mbuox baeng-bieiv, “Gunv nzuonx biauv aqv. Ei meih sienx nyei, za'gengh oix hnangv naaiv nor cuotv daaih aqv.” Doix wuov norm ziangh hoc ninh nyei bou ziouc longx mi'aqv.
8.9: Yie ganh yaac yiem domh baeng-bieiv nyei buoz-ndiev, yaac maaih baeng camv yiem yie nyei ga'ndiev maengx. Yie heuc naaiv dauh mingh, ninh ziouc mingh, heuc wuov dauh daaih, ninh ziouc daaih. Heuc yie nyei nouh zoux naaiv, ninh ziouc zoux aqv.”
8.26: Yesu dau, “Meih mbuo weic haaix diuc ndongc naaic gamh nziex? Meih mbuo sienx duqv hei haic weqv!” Yesu ziouc jiez sin daaih hatc nziaaux caux wuom-laangc. Domh nziaaux ziouc dingh mi'aqv. Wuom-laangc yaac haapv. Haaix nyungc yaac sekv nzengc mi'aqv.
8.5: Yesu bieqc Kaa^be^naa^um Mungv wuov zanc, maaih dauh Lomaa baeng-bieiv daaih lorz ninh, tov ninh tengx.
8.27: Sai-gorx mbuo mbuoqc horngh haic yaac gorngv, “Naaiv haaix nyungc mienh orqv? Liemh nziaaux caux wuom-laangc yaac muangx ninh nyei waac.”
8.14: Yesu bieqc Bide nyei biauv, buatc Bide nyei maa-diev butv baengc, sin jorm nyei, bueix jienv wuov coux.
8.3: Yesu sung buoz maan jienv wuov laanh mienh yaac gorngv, “Yie oix zorc nyei. Meih longx daaih maah!” Wuov laanh mienh nyei baengc ziouc liemh zeih longx mi'aqv.
8.7: Yesu gorngv, “Yie oix mingh zorc ninh longx.”
8.10: Yesu haiz naaiv deix waac ninh mbuoqc horngh haic ziouc mbuox gan ninh daaih wuov deix mienh, “Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, yie maiv buatc jiex mienh sienx ndongc naaiv longx. Liemh I^saa^laa^en Mienh yaac maiv maaih yietc dauh.
8.2: Maaih laanh mienh butv gomh huv baengc daaih gueic njiec Yesu nyei nza'hmien. Ninh gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, se gorngv meih oix nor, meih haih zorc longx yie nyei baengc.”
8.1: Yesu yiem mbong njiec daaih wuov zanc, maaih mienh camv! nyei gan jienv ninh mingh.
8.31: Naaiv deix mienv ziouc tov Yesu, “Meih zunc yie mbuo cuotv nor, bun yie mbuo mingh bieqc wuov guanh dungz maah!”
8.6: Baeng-bieiv gorngv, “Domh Gorx aac, yie nyei bou butv baengc-mbai, bueix wuov biauv, diev duqv kouv haic.”
8.8: Baeng-bieiv gorngv, “Domh Gorx ganh maiv zuqc mingh aqv. Yie maiv puix zipv meih bieqc yie nyei biauv. Meih kungx gorngv cuotv hnangv, yie nyei bou ziouc longx aqv.
8.24: Nzaeng jienv nzangv mingh gau, liemh zeih borngz gorng domh nziaaux, buonc wuom jiez laangc nqomz bieqc nzangv. Mv baac Yesu bueix m'njormh mi'aqv.
8.25: Sai-gorx mbuo mingh heuc ninh nyie daaih. Ninh mbuo gorngv, “Ziouv aah! Ziouv! Gaanv njoux maengc ov! Ndortv wuom daic aqv loh!”
8.29: Naaiv deix i dauh mienh liemh zeih heuc mbui nyei, “Tin-Hungh nyei Dorn aah! Meih daaih yie mbuo naaiv zoux haaix nyungc? Ziangh hoc maiv gaengh taux meih daaih zeix yie mbuo fai?”
8.11: Yie yaac mbuox meih mbuo, maaih mienh camv nyei yiem dong bung caux fai bung oix daaih yiem Tin-Hungh nyei guoqv caux Apc^laa^ham, I^sakc caux Yaakopv juangc dieh nyanc hnaangx.
8.32: Yesu gorngv, “Mingh aqv!” Mienv ziouc cuotv wuov deix i dauh mienh mingh bieqc dungz nzengc. Ziangh guanh dungz ziouc tiux njiec kamx ndortv wuom ziemx daic nzengc mi'aqv.
8.16: Lungh maanz-hmuangx, maaih mienh dorh zuqc mienv muoqv nyei mienh camv nyei daaih lorz Yesu. Yesu gorngv nduqc joux waac hnangv ziouc zunc mienv cuotv nzengc mi'aqv. Dauh dauh nyei baengc yaac zorc longx nzengc.

24.21: Weic zuqc taux wuov zanc maaih domh zeqc naanc. Yiem zeix lungh zeix ndau daaih maiv maaih jiex ndongc naaiv nzunc siem. Yangh naaiv jiex yietc liuz yaac maiv maaih aqv.
24.15: “Meih mbuo ziouc duqv buatc douc waac mienh, Ndaa^ni^en, gorngv jiex nyei sic cuotv. Maaih zoux bun nyungc-nyungc waaic wuov dauh domh hieh youx yiem jienv cing-nzengc nyei dorngx, (doqc sou nyei mienh oix zuqc mengh baeqc naaiv deix waac).
24.23: “Wuov zanc, se gorngv haaix dauh mbuox meih mbuo, ‘Mangc gaax, Giduc yiem naaiv!’ fai ‘Giduc yiem wuov!’ maiv dungx sienx.
24.47: Yie mbuox zien meih mbuo, ziouv oix bun naaiv dauh bou goux nzengc ninh nyei yietc zungv jaa-dingh.
24.20: Meih mbuo oix zuqc tov Tin-Hungh, taux biaux nyei ziangh hoc maiv dungx bun doix zuqc dong-gen hnoi fai doix zuqc Dingh Gong Hnoi.
24.18: Yiem ndeic nyei mienh maiv dungx nzuonx biauv zorqv ganh nyei domh lui.
24.33: Fih hnangv nyei, meih mbuo buatc naaiv deix yietc zungv sic cuotv wuov zanc, meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, taux fatv aqv, zungv yiem jienv gaengh ndaangc aqv.
24.43: Naaiv meih mbuo hiuv duqv nyei. Se gorngv biauv-ziouv hiuv duqv lungh muonz zanc janx-zaqc haaix norm ziangh hoc daaih, ninh ziouc ging hnyouv zuov jienv, maiv bun janx-zaqc bieqc biauv.
24.48: Mv baac se gorngv wuov dauh bou maiv benx, ninh yiem hnyouv hnamv, ‘Aa, yie nyei ziouv maiv gaengh nzuonx siepv.’
24.22: Se gorngv Tin-Hungh maiv bun wuov deix hnoi-nyieqc zoqc njiec deix, maiv maaih haaix dauh duqv maengc cuotv. Se weic Tin-Hungh ginv daaih nyei mienh ninh cingx daaih oix bun wuov deix hnoi-nyieqc zoqc njiec.
24.42: “Weic naaiv meih mbuo oix zuqc ging hnyouv mbungh jienv, weic zuqc meih mbuo maiv hiuv duqv meih mbuo nyei Ziouv haaix hnoi daaih.
24.50: Bou jangx maiv zaaic nyei hnoi, jangx maiv zaaic nyei ziangh hoc, ninh nyei ziouv ziouc nzuonx daaih aqv.
24.31: Maaih nzatc nyei qiex mbui, yie ziouc paaiv yie nyei fin-mienh mingh taux biei bung nziaaux, yiem naaiv bung lungh gorn mingh taux wuov bung lungh gorn, siou zunv yie ginv daaih nyei mienh.
24.4: Yesu dau, “Oix zuqc faix fim, maiv dungx muangx haaix dauh nduov meih mbuo.
24.29: “Wuov deix hnoi nyei zeqc naanc yietv jiex liuz, ‘Mba'hnoi ziouc jieqv mingh, hlaax yaac maiv ziux njang aqv. Zuangx hleix yiem wuov lungh oix ndortv njiec daaih. Yiem lungh maaih qaqv nyei ga'naaiv zungv zuqc ndanc dongz.’
24.9: “Taux wuov zanc meih mbuo ziouc zuqc zorqv jiu bun mienh zoux doqc yaac daix guangc. Laaix yie, maanc fingx oix nzorng meih mbuo.
24.37: Noyaa nyei lungh ndiev hnangv haaix nor, yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, aengx daaih wuov zanc yaac oix zuqc hnangv wuov nor.
24.5: Maaih mienh camv nyei oix longc yie nyei mbuox daaih gorngv, ‘Yie se dongh Giduc wuov dauh aqv.’ Ninh mbuo ziouc nduov mienh camv.
24.3: Yesu zueiz jienv Ga'lanv Mbong wuov zanc, sai-gorx mbuo ganh lengc jeiv daaih naaic ninh, “Tov mbuox yie mbuo oc. Naaiv deix sic haaix zanc oix cuotv? Maaih haaix nyungc jangx-hoc oix bun cing meih aengx oix daaih yaac bun cing baamh gen nyei setv mueiz oix taux?”
24.39: Ninh mbuo liemh maiv hiuv mbiungc-suiv-imx oix yiemx taux wuom guaatv ninh mbuo mingh nzengc. Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, aengx daaih wuov zanc yaac oix hnangv naaic nor.
24.6: Taux wuov zanc meih mbuo duqv haiz mienh mborqv domh jaax yaac haiz mborqv domh jaax nyei fienx, mv baac meih mbuo maiv dungx gamh nziex. Naaiv deix sic ndongc haaix oix zuqc cuotv, mv baac setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc maiv gaengh taux.
24.8: Naaiv deix sic cuotv daaih bun cing setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc jiez gorn cuotv.
24.46: Ziouv nzuonx daaih buatc naaiv dauh bou zoux duqv zingx, bou ziouc njien-youh aqv.
24.7: Naaiv fingx oix caux wuov fingx mborqv jaax. Naaiv norm guoqv oix caux wuov norm guoqv mborqv domh jaax. Maaih deix dorngx oix zuqc ngorc hnaangx, maaih deix dorngx ndau dongz.
24.32: “Meih mbuo oix zuqc longc ngongh nyorx ndiangx hoqc yietc diuc. Buatc ndiangx cuotv cunx, nqoi normh lunx, meih mbuo ziouc hiuv duqv aav lamh deix bieqc haac gueix mi'aqv.
24.25: Muangx oc. Naaiv deix sic maiv gaengh cuotv yie jaa-ndaangc mbuox ziangx meih mbuo.
24.17: Mienh yiem biauv-ngorh oix zuqc gaanv njiec, liemh maiv dungx bieqc biauv zorqv haaix nyungc dorh mingh.
24.12: Hiuang orqv nyei sic oix faanv, mienh camv nyei hnyouv ziouc namx jienv njiec, maiv hnamv mienh yaac maiv hnamv Tin-Hungh.
24.34: Yie gorngv zien mbuox meih mbuo, naaiv doic mienh guei seix maiv gaengh nzengc, naaiv deix yietc zungv sic ziouc cuotv daaih aqv.
24.30: “Wuov zanc yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, nyei jangx-hoc oix yiem wuov lungh cuotv daaih. Lungh ndiev maanc fingx mienh ziouc bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv. Ninh mbuo duqv buatc yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, maaih qaqv caux domh njang-laangc yiem wuov mbuonx njiec daaih.
24.11: Aengx maaih jaav douc waac mienh camv nyei cuotv daaih nduov mienh camv.
24.28: Ga'naaiv-daic yiem haaix, domh jaangv-ngongh yaac yiem wuov aqv.
24.44: Hnangv naaic, meih mbuo oix zuqc liuc leiz ziangx, zanc-zanc zuov jienv, weic zuqc meih mbuo liemh jangx maiv zaaic nyei ziangh hoc, yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, ziouc taux aqv.
24.45: “Wuov nyungc, haaix dauh zoux hnyouv zingx, cong-mengh nyei bou? Wuov dauh aeqv, ziouv paaiv goux ninh nyei biauv zong mienh yaac ziux ziangh hoc zorqv yietc zuangx bou nyei buonc nyanc hopv bun ninh mbuo.
24.19: Yiem wuov deix hnoi-nyieqc maaih jienv sin nyei, caux maaih gu'nguaaz hopv nyorx nyei m'sieqv dorn za'gengh zuqc kouv aqv.
24.35: Lungh ndau oix jiex nzengc, mv baac yie nyei waac yietc liuz maiv jiex.
24.41: Maaih i dauh m'sieqv dorn morc maeqc. Oix zipv dauh mingh, guangc dauh yiem wuov.
24.13: Mv baac haaix dauh diev duqv taux daauh taux mueiz, wuov dauh ziouc duqv njoux aqv.
24.40: Wuov zanc maaih i laanh mienh yiem wuov ndeic zoux gong. Oix zipv laanh mingh, guangc laanh yiem wuov.
24.26: “Hnangv naaic, se gorngv maaih mienh mbuox meih mbuo, ‘Mangc maah! Ninh yiem wuov deic-bung-huaang,’ maiv dungx cuotv mingh lorz. Mienh aengx gorngv, ‘Mangc maah! Ninh yiem biauv gu'nyuoz,’ maiv dungx sienx.
24.14: Tin-Hungh zoux Ziouv gunv mienh nyei kuv fienx zungv oix zunh buangv lungh ndiev weic zoux zorng-zengx bun maanc fingx hiuv. Nqa'haav, setv mueiz nyei hnoi-nyieqc ziouc taux aqv.
24.27: Weic zuqc borngz mba'lingc yiem dong bung njapc dangh, njang mingh taux fai bung hnangv haaix nor, yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn, aengx daaih wuov zanc yaac oix hnangv wuov nor.
24.38: Mbiungc-suiv-imx maiv gaengh yiemx lungh ndiev wuov zanc, mienh nyanc yaac hopv, bungx sieqv, gorngv auv zoux cing-jaa, taux Noyaa bieqc nzangv wuov hnoi.
24.49: Ninh ziouc dongz sin mborqv ninh nyei zoux bou doic yaac caux hopv diuv nquin nyei mienh juangc nyanc juangc hopv.
24.36: “Wuov norm hnoi, wuov norm ziangh hoc, maiv maaih haaix dauh hiuv. Liemh tin-dorngh nyei fin-mienh maiv hiuv. Dorn yaac maiv hiuv. Kungx Zaangc Diex ganh hiuv hnangv.
24.10: Wuov zanc mienh camv oix cuotv, maiv sienx yie. Laanh oix zorqv laanh jiu bun win-wangv. Laanh yaac oix nzorng laanh.
24.2: Yesu gorngv, “Meih mbuo buatc naaiv deix biauv nyei saah? Yie mbuox zien meih mbuo, maaih norm hnoi yietc zungv oix zuqc caeqv nzengc. Maiv maaih yietc kuaaiv la'bieiv lapv jienv aqv.”
24.1: Yesu yiem zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv cuotv daaih, yangh jienv jauv mingh wuov zanc, sai-gorx mbuo daaih nuqv jienv zaangc Tin-Hungh nyei biauv-hlen wuov deix biauv heuc ninh mangc.
24.24: Weic zuqc maaih mienh gorngv ninh mbuo zoux Giduc mv baac jaav nyei, aengx maaih jaav douc waac mienh oix cuotv daaih. Ninh mbuo oix zoux domh jangx-hoc caux mbuoqc horngh nyei sic nduov mienh. Se gorngv haih nduov duqv zuqc nor, ninh mbuo oix liemh Tin-Hungh ginv daaih nyei mienh nduov.
24.16: Wuov zanc, yiem Yu^ndie Saengv wuov deix oix zuqc biaux faaux mbong.
24.51: Ziouv oix dingc ninh nyei zuiz hniev nyei, zunc ninh mingh caux beih zaqc hnyouv njuotv nyei mienh yiem, bungx-sing bungx-qiex nyei nyiemv, ngaatc jienv nyaah diev.”

25.21: “Ninh nyei ziouv gorngv, ‘Longx aqv. Meih se longx haic, hnyouv zingx nyei bou. Deix baav nyaanh hnangv meih goux duqv ndongc naaic longx, yie oix bun meih goux camv nyei. Gunv bieqc daaih caux yie njien-youh maah!’
25.15: Ninh ei gorqv-mienh nyei banh zeic bun. Maaih dauh ninh bun biaa waanc zinh. Maaih dauh bun i waanc zinh. Maaih dauh bun yietc waanc zinh. Bun liuz, ninh ziouc cuotv jauv mingh mi'aqv.
25.23: Ninh nyei ziouv gorngv, ‘Longx haic aqv. Meih se longx haic, hnyouv zingx nyei bou. Deix baav nyaanh hnangv meih goux duqv ndongc naaiv longx, yie oix bun meih goux camv. Gunv bieqc daaih caux yie njien-youh aqv.’
25.20: Duqv biaa waanc zinh wuov dauh aengx dorh jienv biaa waanc ndaauv-daauh bun ninh nyei ziouv. Ninh gorngv, ‘Ziouv aac, meih bun biaa waanc zinh. Mangc gaax naaiv! Yie aengx zornc duqv biaa waanc.’
25.18: Mv baac duqv yietc waanc wuov dauh cuotv mingh wetv kuotv biopv jienv bingx ninh nyei ziouv nyei nyaanh.
25.33: Ba'gi yungh yiem yie nyei mbiaauc maengx, yungh yiem zaaix maengx.
25.43: Yie zoux ganh fingx mienh, meih mbuo yaac maiv zipv yie bieqc biauv. Yie maiv maaih lui-houx zuqv, meih mbuo maiv bun lui-houx yie zuqv. Yie butv baengc fai zuqc wuonx loh, meih mbuo yaac maiv mangc yie.’
25.22: “Duqv i waanc zinh wuov dauh bou aengx bieqc daaih gorngv, ‘Ziouv aac, meih bun i waanc zinh yie. Mangc gaax naaiv! Yie aengx zornc duqv i waanc.’
25.42: Weic zuqc yie ngorc, meih mbuo maiv bun yie nyanc. Jaang nqaatv, meih mbuo maiv bun wuom yie hopv.
25.31: “Yie, Baamh Mienh nyei Dorn daaih zoux Hungh wuov zanc, maaih zuangx fin-mienh yaac oix caux jienv daaih. Yie yaac oix zueiz jienv yie njang-laangc nyei weic.
25.4: Guai wuov deix, bouh jienv dang aengx zorqv youh dapv baengh dorh jienv mingh.
25.29: weic zuqc haaix dauh maaih deix nyei, oix tipv bun ninh maaih gauh camv, ninh ziouc maaih zengc. Haaix dauh maiv maaih, liemh ninh maaih deix baav nyei, zungv zuqc zorqv mi'aqv.
25.9: “Guai wuov deix dau, ‘Gamh nziex youh maiv gaux bun meih mbuo caux yie mbuo lomh nzoih longc. Meih mbuo oix zuqc mingh wuov maaic youh nyei dorngx maaiz.’
25.37: “Wuov deix kuv mienh ziouc dau Hungh Diex, ‘Ziouv aac, yie mbuo ziangh haaix buatc meih ngorc yaac bun meih nyanc? Buatc meih jaang nqaatv yaac bun meih hopv?
25.5: Wuov deix sieqv-dorn zuov lauh nyei, maiv buatc siang-laangh daaih ziouc m'njormh da'hngatv, ziang naaic m'njormh nzengc.
25.3: Hngongx wuov deix, bouh jienv dang mingh mv baac maiv dorh youh mingh mbungh.
25.39: Yie mbuo ziangh haaix buatc meih butv baengc fai zuqc wuonx wuov loh yaac mingh mangc meih?’
25.6: “Taux ndaamv muonz, maaih qiex heuc jienv gorngv, ‘Siang-laangh taux aav loh! Daaih zipv ninh aqv.’
